 849  8C9D                  include "./Universe/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 8C9D              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 8C9D              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 8C9D              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 8C9D              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 8C9D
   6+ 8C9D              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 8C9D              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 8C9D
   9+ 8C9D EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 8C9E CD 61 98                             call    doRND
  11+ 8CA1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 8CA2 F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 8CA4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 8CA5 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 8CA7 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 8CA8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 8CA9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 8CAA CD 61 98                             call    doRND
  19+ 8CAD EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 8CAE 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 8CAF E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 8CB1 B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 8CB2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 8CB3 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 8CB4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 8CB5 CD 61 98                             call    doRND
  27+ 8CB8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 8CB9 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 8CBB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 8CBC 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 8CBD E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 8CBF 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 8CC0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 8CC1 CD 61 98                             call    doRND
  35+ 8CC4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 8CC5 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 8CC6 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 8CC8 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 8CC9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 8CCA 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 8CCB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 8CCC CD 61 98                             call    doRND
  43+ 8CCF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 8CD0 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 8CD2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 8CD3 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 8CD4 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 8CD6 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 8CD8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 8CD9 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 8CDA C9                                   ret
  52+ 8CDB
  53+ 8CDB              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
  54+ 8CDB 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ 8CDC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 8CDE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ 8CDF AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ 8CE0                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
  58+ 8CE0 FA 0E 8D    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
  59+ 8CE3 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  60+ 8CE4 B2                                   or      d
  61+ 8CE5                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ 8CE5 FA EF 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  62+ 8CE8 B7                                   or      a
  63+ 8CE9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  64+ 8CEB                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  64+ 8CEB FA 02 8D    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  65+ 8CEE C9                                   ret
  66+ 8CEF 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  67+ 8CF0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  68+ 8CF2 67                                   ld      h,a
  69+ 8CF3 7A                                   ld      a,d
  70+ 8CF4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  71+ 8CF6 57                                   ld      d,a
  72+ 8CF7 B7                                   or      a
  73+ 8CF8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  74+ 8CFA                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  74+ 8CFA FA 02 8D    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  75+ 8CFD 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  76+ 8CFE F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  77+ 8D00 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ 8D01 C9                                   ret
  79+ 8D02              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  79+ 8D02 AF          >                    xor a
  79+ 8D03 95          >                    sub l
  79+ 8D04 6F          >                    ld l,a
  79+ 8D05 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  79+ 8D06 94          >                    sub h
  79+ 8D07 67          >                    ld h,a
  80+ 8D08 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ 8D09 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  82+ 8D0B B4                                   or      h
  83+ 8D0C 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  84+ 8D0D C9                                   ret
  85+ 8D0E B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  86+ 8D0F 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  87+ 8D10 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  88+ 8D12 67                                   ld      h,a
  89+ 8D13 7A                                   ld      a,d
  90+ 8D14 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  91+ 8D16 57                                   ld      d,a
  92+ 8D17 19                                   add     hl,de
  93+ 8D18 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  94+ 8D19 B4                                   or      h
  95+ 8D1A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  96+ 8D1B C9                                   ret
  97+ 8D1C
  98+ 8D1C 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  99+ 8D1D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 100+ 8D1F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 101+ 8D20 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 102+ 8D21                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 102+ 8D21 FA 39 8D    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 103+ 8D24 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 104+ 8D25 B2                                   or      d
 105+ 8D26                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 105+ 8D26 FA 2B 8D    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 106+ 8D29 19                                   add     hl,de
 107+ 8D2A C9                                   ret
 108+ 8D2B 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 109+ 8D2C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 110+ 8D2E 67                                   ld      h,a
 111+ 8D2F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 112+ 8D30 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 113+ 8D32 57                                   ld      d,a
 114+ 8D33 19                                   add     hl,de
 115+ 8D34 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 116+ 8D36 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 117+ 8D37 67                                   ld      h,a
 118+ 8D38 C9                                   ret
 119+ 8D39 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 120+ 8D3A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 121+ 8D3C 67                                   ld      h,a
 122+ 8D3D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123+ 8D3E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 124+ 8D40 57                                   ld      d,a
 125+ 8D41 B7                                   or      a
 126+ 8D42 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 127+ 8D44 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 128+ 8D46 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 129+ 8D47 B4                                   or      h
 130+ 8D48 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 131+ 8D49 C9                                   ret
 132+ 8D4A              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 132+ 8D4A AF          >                    xor a
 132+ 8D4B 95          >                    sub l
 132+ 8D4C 6F          >                    ld l,a
 132+ 8D4D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 132+ 8D4E 94          >                    sub h
 132+ 8D4F 67          >                    ld h,a
 133+ 8D50 78                                   ld      a,b
 134+ 8D51 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 135+ 8D53 B4                                   or      h
 136+ 8D54 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 137+ 8D55 C9                                   ret
 138+ 8D56              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 139+ 8D56 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 140+ 8D58 78                                   ld      a,b
 141+ 8D59 32 7F 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 142+ 8D5C 21 CC 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 143+ 8D5F CD 9D 8C     InitStarsLoop:          call    InitStarAtHL
 144+ 8D62 10 FB                                djnz    InitStarsLoop
 145+ 8D64 C9                                   ret
 146+ 8D65              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 147+ 8D65              StarsForward:          ; break
 148+ 8D65 3A 7F 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 149+ 8D68 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 150+ 8D69 FD 21 CC 96                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 151+ 8D6D C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 152+ 8D6E FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 153+ 8D71 5F                                   ld      e,a
 154+ 8D72 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 155+ 8D74 3A 61 94                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 156+ 8D77 FE 00                                cp      0
 157+ 8D79 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 158+ 8D7B 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 159+ 8D7C 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 160+ 8D7D 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 161+ 8D7F CD 18 A4                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 162+ 8D82                                      ShiftHLRight1
 162+ 8D82 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 162+ 8D84 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 163+ 8D86                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 163+ 8D86 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 8D88 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 8D8A 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 165+ 8D8B F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 166+ 8D8D DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 167+ 8D8F FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 167+ 8D93 66 05
 168+ 8D95 ED 5B 62 94                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 169+ 8D99 CD DB 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 170+ 8D9C                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 170+ 8D9C CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 170+ 8D9E C2 F3 8E    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 171+ 8DA1 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 171+ 8DA5 74 05
 172+ 8DA7 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 172+ 8DAB 66 01
 173+ 8DAD 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 174+ 8DAE E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 175+ 8DB0 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 176+ 8DB1 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 177+ 8DB3 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 178+ 8DB5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 179+ 8DB6 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 180+ 8DB8 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 181+ 8DB9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 182+ 8DBA CD 1C 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 183+ 8DBD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 184+ 8DBE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 185+ 8DC0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 185+ 8DC0 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 185+ 8DC2 D2 F3 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 186+ 8DC5 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 186+ 8DC9 74 01
 187+ 8DCB FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 187+ 8DCF 66 03
 188+ 8DD1 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 189+ 8DD2 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 190+ 8DD4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 191+ 8DD5 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 192+ 8DD7 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 193+ 8DD9 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 194+ 8DDA E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 195+ 8DDC B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 196+ 8DDD 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 197+ 8DDE CD 1C 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 198+ 8DE1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 199+ 8DE2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 200+ 8DE4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 200+ 8DE4 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 200+ 8DE6 D2 F3 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 201+ 8DE9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 202+ 8DEA E6 80                                and     $80
 203+ 8DEC 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 204+ 8DEE 7C                                   ld      a,h
 205+ 8DEF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 205+ 8DEF FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 205+ 8DF1 D2 F3 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 206+ 8DF4 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 206+ 8DF8 74 03
 207+ 8DFA              ; Now roll
 208+ 8DFA              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 209+ 8DFA 2A 24 94     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 210+ 8DFD 7D                                   ld      a,l
 211+ 8DFE FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 8E00 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 8E02                                      ;break
 214+ 8E02                                      ;ld      a,$80
 215+ 8E02                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 216+ 8E02 E5                                   push    hl
 217+ 8E03 7C                                   ld      a,h
 218+ 8E04 E6 80                                and     $80
 219+ 8E06 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 8E07 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 8E08 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 8E0B 5F                                   ld      e,a
 223+ 8E0C E6 80                                and     $80
 224+ 8E0E 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 8E0F 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 226+ 8E10 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 227+ 8E12 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 8E13 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 8E15 79                                   ld      a,c
 230+ 8E16 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 8E17 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 8E18 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 8E19 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 8E1D 66 01
 234+ 8E1F CD DB 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 8E22 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 8E26 74 01
 236+ 8E28              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 8E28              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 8E28 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 8E29 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 8E2A E6 80                                and     $80
 241+ 8E2C 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 242+ 8E2D 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 243+ 8E2E FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 244+ 8E31 5F                                   ld      e,a
 245+ 8E32 E6 80                                and     $80
 246+ 8E34 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 247+ 8E35 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 248+ 8E36 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 8E38 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 250+ 8E39 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 251+ 8E3B 79                                   ld      a,c
 252+ 8E3C A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 253+ 8E3D B2                                   or      d
 254+ 8E3E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 255+ 8E3F FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 255+ 8E43 66 03
 256+ 8E45 CD 1C 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 257+ 8E48 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 257+ 8E4C 74 03
 258+ 8E4E 3A 17 94     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 259+ 8E51 FE 00                                cp      0
 260+ 8E53 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 261+ 8E55              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 262+ 8E55 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 263+ 8E56 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 264+ 8E59 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 265+ 8E5A ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 266+ 8E5C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 267+ 8E5D ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 268+ 8E5F                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 268+ 8E5F CB 23       >			   sla e
 268+ 8E61 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 269+ 8E63 3A 19 94                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 270+ 8E66 B2                                   or      d
 271+ 8E67 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 272+ 8E68 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 272+ 8E6C 66 03
 273+ 8E6E CD 1C 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 274+ 8E71 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 274+ 8E75 74 03
 275+ 8E77              ; now work out screen pos
 276+ 8E77              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 277+ 8E77              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 278+ 8E77              ;        pop     de
 279+ 8E77               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 280+ 8E77                                      ;pop     de
 281+ 8E77              .NoPitch:
 282+ 8E77 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 283+ 8E7A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 284+ 8E7B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 285+ 8E7D                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 285+ 8E7D CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 285+ 8E7F C2 88 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 286+ 8E82 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 287+ 8E84 4F                                   ld      c,a
 288+ 8E85 C3 8D 8E                             jp      StarDoneX
 289+ 8E88 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 290+ 8E89 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 291+ 8E8B 90                                   sub     b
 292+ 8E8C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 293+ 8E8D FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 294+ 8E90 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 8E91 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 296+ 8E93                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 296+ 8E93 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 296+ 8E95 C2 9E 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 297+ 8E98 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 298+ 8E9A 47                                   ld      b,a
 299+ 8E9B C3 A3 8E                             jp      StarDoneY
 300+ 8E9E 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 301+ 8E9F 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 302+ 8EA1 90                                   sub     b
 303+ 8EA2 47                                   ld      b,a
 304+ 8EA3 3E FC        StarDoneY:              ld      a,$FC
 305+ 8EA5 C5                                   push    bc
 306+ 8EA6              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 306+ 8EA6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 307+ 8EAA CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 308+ 8EAD FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 309+ 8EB0 C1                                   pop    bc
 310+ 8EB1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 310+ 8EB1 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 310+ 8EB3 D2 E3 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 311+ 8EB6 3E D8                                ld      a,$D8
 312+ 8EB8 0C                                   inc     c
 313+ 8EB9 C5                                   push    bc
 314+ 8EBA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 314+ 8EBA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 315+ 8EBE CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 316+ 8EC1 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 317+ 8EC4 C1                                   pop    bc
 318+ 8EC5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 318+ 8EC5 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 318+ 8EC7 D2 E3 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 319+ 8ECA 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 320+ 8ECC 04                                   inc     b
 321+ 8ECD C5                                   push    bc
 322+ 8ECE                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 322+ 8ECE ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 323+ 8ED2 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 324+ 8ED5 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 325+ 8ED8 C1                                   pop    bc
 326+ 8ED9 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 327+ 8EDB 0D                                   dec     c
 328+ 8EDC                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 328+ 8EDC ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 329+ 8EE0 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 330+ 8EE3 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 331+ 8EE4 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 332+ 8EE6 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 333+ 8EE7 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 334+ 8EEB E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 335+ 8EEC FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 336+ 8EEE 05                                   dec     b
 337+ 8EEF C2 6D 8D                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 338+ 8EF2 C9                                   ret
 339+ 8EF3              ResetStar:              ;break
 340+ 8EF3                                      ;pop     de
 341+ 8EF3 C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 342+ 8EF4 3A 7F 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 343+ 8EF7 90                                   sub     b
 344+ 8EF8 57                                   ld      d,a
 345+ 8EF9 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 346+ 8EFB ED 30                                mul
 347+ 8EFD 21 CC 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 348+ 8F00 19                                   add     hl,de
 349+ 8F01 CD 9D 8C                             call    InitStarAtHL
 350+ 8F04 C3 EB 8E                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 351+ 8F07              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 352+ 8F07 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 353+ 8F0A FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 354+ 8F0D 6F                                   ld      l,a
 355+ 8F0E E6 7F                                and     $7F
 356+ 8F10 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ 8F11 CD BB A3                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 358+ 8F14 7D                                   ld      a,l
 359+ 8F15                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 359+ 8F15 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 359+ 8F17 C2 22 8F    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 360+ 8F1A              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 361+ 8F1A 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 362+ 8F1C 26 00                                ld          h,0
 363+ 8F1E 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 364+ 8F1F C3 29 8F                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 365+ 8F22              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 366+ 8F22 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 367+ 8F24 26 00                                ld          h,0
 368+ 8F26                                      ClearCarryFlag
 368+ 8F26 B7          >                    or a
 369+ 8F27 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 370+ 8F29              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 371+ 8F29 7D                                   ld          a,l
 372+ 8F2A 32 24 97                             ld          (varStarX),a
 373+ 8F2D C9                                   ret
 374+ 8F2E
 375+ 8F2E FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 376+ 8F31 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 377+ 8F34 6F                                   ld          l,a
 378+ 8F35 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 379+ 8F37 47                                   ld          b,a
 380+ 8F38 CD BB A3                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 381+ 8F3B 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 382+ 8F3C                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 382+ 8F3C CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 382+ 8F3E C2 49 8F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 383+ 8F41                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 384+ 8F41 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 385+ 8F43                                      ClearCarryFlag
 385+ 8F43 B7          >                    or a
 386+ 8F44 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 387+ 8F46 C3 4E 8F                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 388+ 8F49              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 389+ 8F49 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 390+ 8F4B 26 00                                ld          h,0
 391+ 8F4D 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 392+ 8F4E              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 393+ 8F4E 7D                                   ld          a,l
 394+ 8F4F 32 25 97                             ld          (varStarY),a
 395+ 8F52 C9                                   ret
 396+ 8F53
 397+ 8F53
# file closed: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
 850  8F53              ;    include "Universe/move_object-MVEIT.asm"
 851  8F53                  include "./ModelRender/draw_object.asm"
# file opened: ./ModelRender/draw_object.asm
   1+ 8F53              JumpIfObjectIsPlanet:   MACRO target
   2+ 8F53 ~                                    ld a,(UbnkHullCopy)
   3+ 8F53 ~                                    bit 7,a
   4+ 8F53 ~                                    jp  nz,target
   5+ 8F53                                      ENDM
   6+ 8F53
   7+ 8F53              SetMaxVisibility:       MACRO
   8+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
   9+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  10+ 8F53                                      ENDM
  11+ 8F53
  12+ 8F53              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8F53 ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8F53 ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8F53 ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8F53 ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8F53 ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8F53 ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:
  21+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  22+ 8F53 ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8F53 ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8F53 ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8F53 ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  26+ 8F53                                      ENDM
  27+ 8F53
  28+ 8F53              LL10AddGunNode:         MACRO
  29+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		a,(GunVertexAddr)	            ; Hull byte6, node gun*4 (Probably should be from bank            ;         hl = z / 8
  30+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0
  31+ 8F53 ~                                    ld      b,0                             ; bc now - GunNode                                                ;                                              ;             GOTO LL13
  32+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		a,$FF						    ; flag on node heap at gun                                        ;          else
  33+ 8F53 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray                ; flag node on node heap                                          ;
  34+ 8F53 ~                                    add     hl,bc                           ; at position UBnkNodeArray[GunNode]
  35+ 8F53 ~            MakeBothGunNodesVisible:
  36+ 8F53 ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ; made both gun line notes visible always
  37+ 8F53 ~                                    inc     hl                              ;
  38+ 8F53 ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ;
  39+ 8F53                                      ENDM
  40+ 8F53
  41+ 8F53              JumpIfTooFarAway:       MACRO   target
  42+ 8F53 ~                                    ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  43+ 8F53 ~                                    ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  44+ 8F53 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ;
  45+ 8F53 ~                                    IfANotZeroGoto target                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  46+ 8F53                                      ENDM
  47+ 8F53
  48+ 8F53              DisplayObject:
  49+ 8F53              LL9:										; Draw object in current bank                                  ;;;; Display object LL9
  50+ 8F53                 ; DEBUG JumpIfObjectIsPlanet LL25
  51+ 8F53              ; .................................................................................................................................

  54+ 8F58              ;LL9TestRemoveShip:

  56+ 8F58              ; .................................................................................................................................
  57+ 8F58              LL9NoEraseLines:
  58+ 8F58                  JumpOnMemBitSet UBnkexplDsp,5,DoExplosionOrClear7 ; mask for bit 5, exploding, display explosion state|missiles  EE28 bit5 set, explosion ongoing
  58+ 8F58 3A 2B C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)
  58+ 8F5B CB 6F       >                        bit 	5,a
  58+ 8F5D C2 88 8F    >                        jp      nz,DoExplosionOrClear7
  59+ 8F60                  JumpOnBitClear a,7,DoExplosionOrClear7  ; we now have it in A so EE28 bit7 clear, else Start blowing up!                      ;;;;
  59+ 8F60 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  59+ 8F62 CA 88 8F    >                        jp      z,DoExplosionOrClear7
  60+ 8F65 E6 3F        	and		$3F								; clear bits 7,6                                               ;;;; else
  61+ 8F67 32 2B C0     	ld		(UBnkexplDsp),a					; INWK+31                                                      ;;;;    clear bit 7 & 6 of INKW31
  62+ 8F6A              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  63+ 8F6A              LL9ZeroAccelRotCtr:
  64+ 8F6A                  ldWriteZero UBnkAccel                   ; byte #28 accel (INF),Y                                       ;;;;    set UBnkAccel & UBnkrotZCounter to 0
  64+ 8F6A AF          >               xor      a
  64+ 8F6B 32 28 C0    >               ld       (UBnkAccel),a
  65+ 8F6E 32 2A C0     	ld		(UBnkrotZCounter),a				; byte #30 rotz counter (INF),Y                                ;;;;
  66+ 8F71 CD 4D CD     	call	EraseOldLines					; EE51 \ if bit3 set erase old lines in XX19 heap              ;;;;    gosub erase old lines (EE51)
  67+ 8F74              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................

  69+ 8F74 3E 12       >               ld       a,18

  70+ 8F79              	ldCopyByte ExplosionCtAddr,UbnkEdgeHeapBytes ; Hull byte#7 explosion of ship type e.g. &2A           ;;;;    set XX19 [2] to Explosion type for ship (i.e nbr of
  70+ 8F79 3A 06 C3    >               ld       a,(ExplosionCtAddr)

  72+ 8F82 3A 14 C0         ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                                                                                   ;;;;    set a to z pos sign
  73+ 8F85 C3 90 8F     	jp      ObjectInFront                                                                                  ;;;;    goto DoExplosion
  74+ 8F88              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  75+ 8F88              DoExplosionOrClear7:	                                                                                   ;;;;
  76+ 8F88              EE28:										; bit5 set do explosion, or bit7 clear, dont kill.             ;;;;   DoExplosion:If z ccordinate sign is +ve
  77+ 8F88              EE49:
  78+ 8F88              	JumpOnMemBitSet UBnKzsgn,7,TestToRemove ; if zSign is negative then its behind so see if we remove
  78+ 8F88 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  78+ 8F8B CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  78+ 8F8D C2 FE 8F    >                        jp      nz,TestToRemove
  79+ 8F90              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  80+ 8F90              ObjectInFront:
  81+ 8F90              LL10:										; LL10	 object in front of you                                   ; if object z is > FarInFront
  82+ 8F90                  JumpIfMemGTENusng UBnKzhi,FarInFront,TestToRemove  ; LL14		\ test to remove object                               ;    else if abs(x) > z or abs(y) > z
  82+ 8F90 3A 13 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnKzhi)
  82+ 8F93 FE C0       >                        cp     FarInFront
  82+ 8F95 D2 FE 8F    >                        jp	  nc,TestToRemove
  83+ 8F98              LL10CheckFov:
  84+ 8F98                  JumpIfObjectOutsideFov TestToRemove     ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8F98             >LL10CheckXInFoV:
  84+ 8F98 2A 0C C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  84+ 8F9B ED 5B 12 C0 >                        ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  84+ 8F9F B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  84+ 8FA0 ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  84+ 8FA2 CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8FA4 CA FE 8F    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8FA7             >LL10CheckYInFoV:
  84+ 8FA7 2A 0F C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  84+ 8FAA B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  84+ 8FAB ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  84+ 8FAD CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8FAF CA FE 8F    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  85+ 8FB2              LookAtGunNode:
  86+ 8FB2                  LL10AddGunNode                                                                                                ;         NodeHeap[GunVertex, GunVertex+1] = 255
  86+ 8FB2 3A 05 C3    >                        ld		a,(GunVertexAddr)	            ; Hull byte6, node gun*4 (Probably should be from bank            ;         hl = z / 8
  86+ 8FB5 4F          >                        ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0

  87+ 8FC1              LL10TestTooFarAway:                         ; if zhi / 8 > 0 then its too far
  88+ 8FC1                  JumpIfTooFarAway SkipToAsFar            ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8FC1 2A 12 C0    >                        ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  88+ 8FC4             >                        ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  88+ 8FC4 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FC6 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FC8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FCA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FCC CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FCE CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FD0 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ;
  88+ 8FD1             >                        IfANotZeroGoto SkipToAsFar                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8FD1 FE 00       >				cp	0
  88+ 8FD3 C2 E9 8F    >				jp	nz,SkipToAsFar
  89+ 8FD6              LL10CloseEnoughToDraw:
  90+ 8FD6              ; if zhi /16
  91+ 8FD6 7C               ld      a,h                             ; get zHi shifted again
  92+ 8FD7 CB 1F            rr      a                               ; bring in hi bit0 from last shiftHLRight1
  93+ 8FD9 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  94+ 8FDB CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  95+ 8FDD CB 3F            srl     a                               ; zhi is now max 31
  96+ 8FDF 32 8D C0         ld      (UBnkVisibility),a              ; set XX4 to result, If this occurs then it’s a guaranteed call to LL17 to draw.
  97+ 8FE2              ;    Note the use of hop for jump/branch instrunction Rather than hop being calc logic
  98+ 8FE2              ;    The original did a bransh on positive but 3 shift right logicalks means bit 7 can never be set
  99+ 8FE2              ObjectDrawForwards:
 100+ 8FE2 CD 90 90         call    DrawForwards
 101+ 8FE5 C9               ret
 102+ 8FE6 C3 E2 8F         jp      ObjectDrawForwards              ; LL17 guaranteed hop to Draw wireframe

 104+ 8FE9              SkipToAsFar:
 105+ 8FE9              ; IF we are here then the ship may just be a dot, if its exploding thought that overrides dot
 106+ 8FE9              LL13:                                       ; hopped to as far
 107+ 8FE9              LL13DrawIfNearerThanDotDist:
 108+ 8FE9              ; if dot_distance >= z_hi then we can still draw ship
 109+ 8FE9                  JumpIfMemGTEMemusng DotAddr,UBnKzhi,ObjectDrawForwards

 109+ 8FEC 21 13 C0    >                        ld   hl,UBnKzhi
 109+ 8FEF BE          >                        cp   (hl)
 109+ 8FF0 D2 E2 8F    >                        jp	  nc,ObjectDrawForwards

 111+ 8FF3              ; if exploding then draw ship
 112+ 8FF3 3A 2B C0         ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31	\ exploding/display state|missiles
 113+ 8FF6 E6 20            and     $20                             ; mask bit 5 exploding
 114+ 8FF8 C2 E2 8F         jp      nz,ObjectDrawForwards           ; LL17 hop over to Draw wireframe or exploding
 115+ 8FFB              LL13TooFarPlotPoint:

  44+ 90A3 AF          >               xor      a
  44+ 90A4 32 FF 93    >               ld       (LastNormalVisible),a
  45+ 90A7              LL41:                                       ; visibilities now set in XX2,X Transpose matrix.                                       ;;;
  46+ 90A7 C3 AD 90             jp      TransposeMatrix             ; LL42 \ jump to transpose matrix and onwards                                           ;;;    goto LL42
  47+ 90AA              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  48+ 90AA              CullBackFaces:
  49+ 90AA              EE29Entry:
  50+ 90AA CD 6D D4             call    CullV2
  51+ 90AD              ;-- All normals' visibilities now set in XX2,X                                                                                      ;;;
  52+ 90AD              TransposeMatrix:
  53+ 90AD              LL42:	                                    ; DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat                                           ;;; ......................................................
  54+ 90AD CD 6D D0             call    InverseXX16
  55+ 90B0
  56+ 90B0
  57+ 90B0 CD BA DB             call    ProcessNodes                ; Loop through and determine visibility based on faces and position
  58+ 90B3              DrawResults:
  59+ 90B3 CD 8C DC             call    PrepLines                   ; LL72, process lines and clip
  60+ 90B6 CD 52 90             call    DrawLines                   ; Need to plot all lines
  61+ 90B9 C9                   ret
  62+ 90BA
# file closed: ./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm
 854  90BA
 855  90BA                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 90BA
   2+ 90BA 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 90BB 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 90BF 7D
   4+ 90C0 BA 90        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 90C2 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 90C4 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 90C7 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 90C9 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 90CD              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 90CD
  11+ 90CD              memfill_dma:
  12+ 90CD              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 90CD              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 90CD 32 BA 90     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 90D0              .set_target:
  16+ 90D0 22 C7 90     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 90D3              .set_length:
  18+ 90D3 ED 53 C2 90  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 90D7              .write_dma:
  20+ 90D7 21 BB 90     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 90DA 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 90DC 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 90DE ED B3        	otir
  24+ 90E0 C9           	ret
  25+ 90E1
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 856  90E1                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 90E1
   2+ 90E1 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 90E5 7D
   3+ 90E6 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 90E8 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 90EA 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 90ED 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 90EF 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 90F3              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 90F3
  10+ 90F3              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 90F3              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 90F3              .set_target:
  13+ 90F3 22 ED 90     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 90F6              .set_source:
  15+ 90F6 ED 53 E6 90  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 90FA              .set_length:
  17+ 90FA ED 43 E8 90  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 90FE              .write_dma:
  19+ 90FE 21 E1 90     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 9101 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 9103 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 9105 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 9107 C9           	ret
  24+ 9108

 181+ 9148              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 9148              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 9148              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 9148 17 91 18 91  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft

 242+ 91C0              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 91C0
 244+ 91C0
 245+ 91C0              init_keyboard:
 246+ 91C0 21 08 91     	ld		hl,Keys
 247+ 91C3 11 28 00     	ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 248+ 91C6 3E 00        	ld		a,0
 249+ 91C8 CD CD 90     	call	memfill_dma
 250+ 91CB C9           	ret
 251+ 91CC
 252+ 91CC              scan_keyboard:
 253+ 91CC 21 30 91     	ld		hl,RawKeys
 254+ 91CF 11 38 91     	ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 255+ 91D2 AF           	xor		a
 256+ 91D3 FD 2E 08     	ld		iyl,8
 257+ 91D6 DD 21 08 91      ld      ix,Keys
 258+ 91DA              .PortReadLoop:
 259+ 91DA 1A           	ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 260+ 91DB 4F           	ld		c,a
 261+ 91DC 13           	inc		de
 262+ 91DD 1A               ld      a,(de)
 263+ 91DE 47           	ld		b,a
 264+ 91DF 13           	inc		de
 265+ 91E0 ED 78        	in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 266+ 91E2 77           	ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 267+ 91E3 23           	inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 268+ 91E4 06 05        	ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 269+ 91E6              .ProcessBitsLoop:
 270+ 91E6 CB 47        	bit		0,a								; is bit set
 271+ 91E8 28 07            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 272+ 91EA 08               ex      af,af'
 273+ 91EB AF               xor     a
 274+ 91EC C3 F8 91         jp      .SetKey
 275+ 91EF 20 0B        	jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 276+ 91F1              .SetKeyPressed:
 277+ 91F1 08           	ex		af,af'
 278+ 91F2 DD 7E 00         ld      a,(ix+0)
 279+ 91F5 3C               inc     a
 280+ 91F6 E6 03            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 281+ 91F8              .SetKey:
 282+ 91F8 DD 77 00     	ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 91FB 08           	ex		af,af'
 284+ 91FC              .SkipKeySet:
 285+ 91FC DD 23        	inc		ix								; move to next key
 286+ 91FE CB 3F        	srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 287+ 9200 10 E4        	djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 288+ 9202 FD 2D            dec     iyl
 289+ 9204 20 D4            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 290+ 9206 C9           	ret
 291+ 9207
 292+ 9207              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 293+ 9207 ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 294+ 9207 ~                                  add     hl,a
 295+ 9207 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 296+ 9207 ~                                  ld      e,a
 297+ 9207 ~                                  inc     hl
 298+ 9207 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 299+ 9207 ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 300+ 9207                                    ENDM
 301+ 9207
 302+ 9207
 303+ 9207              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 304+ 9207              wait_for_key_a_press:
 305+ 9207                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 305+ 9207 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 305+ 920A ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 305+ 920C 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 920D 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 305+ 920E 23          >                      inc     hl
 305+ 920F 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 9210 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 306+ 9211 D5               push    de
 307+ 9212              wait_for_key_press_loop:
 308+ 9212 CD CC 91         call    scan_keyboard
 309+ 9215 E1               pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 310+ 9216 E5               push    hl
 311+ 9217 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 312+ 9218                  JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 312+ 9218 FE 01       >                cp     1
 312+ 921A C2 12 92    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 313+ 921D E1               pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 314+ 921E C9               ret
 315+ 921F
 316+ 921F              wait_for_key_a_held:
 317+ 921F                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 317+ 921F 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 317+ 9222 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 317+ 9224 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 9225 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 317+ 9226 23          >                      inc     hl
 317+ 9227 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 9228 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 318+ 9229 D5               push    de
 319+ 922A              wait_for_key_a_held_loop:
 320+ 922A CD CC 91         call    scan_keyboard
 321+ 922D E1               pop     hl
 322+ 922E E5               push    hl
 323+ 922F 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 324+ 9230                  JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 324+ 9230 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 324+ 9232 DA 2A 92    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 325+ 9235 E1               pop     hl
 326+ 9236 C9               ret
 327+ 9237
 328+ 9237              get_key_a_state:                            ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 329+ 9237                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 329+ 9237 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 329+ 923A ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 329+ 923C 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 923D 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 329+ 923E 23          >                      inc     hl
 329+ 923F 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 9240 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 330+ 9241 EB               ex      de,hl
 331+ 9242 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 332+ 9243 C9               ret
 333+ 9244
 334+ 9244              force_key_press:
 335+ 9244                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 9244 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 9247 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 9249 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 924A 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 924B 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 924C 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 924D 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 924E EB               ex      de,hl
 337+ 924F 3E 01            ld      a,1
 338+ 9251 77               ld      (hl),a
 339+ 9252 C9               ret
 340+ 9253
 341+ 9253              is_key_pressed:                             ; returns z is set if pressed
 342+ 9253                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 9253 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 9256 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 9258 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9259 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 925A 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 925B 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 925C 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 925D EB               ex      de,hl
 344+ 925E 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 925F FE 01            cp      1
 346+ 9261 C9               ret
 347+ 9262
 348+ 9262              is_key_held:                                ; returns z is set if held
 349+ 9262                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 349+ 9262 21 48 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 349+ 9265 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 349+ 9267 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 349+ 9268 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 349+ 9269 23          >                      inc     hl
 349+ 926A 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 349+ 926B 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 350+ 926C EB               ex      de,hl
 351+ 926D 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 352+ 926E E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 353+ 9270 FE 02            cp      2
 354+ 9272 C9               ret
 355+ 9273
 356+ 9273              is_any_key_pressed:
 357+ 9273 21 08 91         ld      hl,Keys
 358+ 9276 06 28            ld      b,40
 359+ 9278 0E 00            ld      c,0
 360+ 927A              .KeyReadLoop:
 361+ 927A 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 362+ 927B FE 01            cp      1
 363+ 927D CA 87 92         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 364+ 9280 23               inc     hl
 365+ 9281 0C               inc     c
 366+ 9282 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 367+ 9284 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 368+ 9286 C9               ret
 369+ 9287              .KeyPressed:
 370+ 9287 79               ld      a,c
 371+ 9288 C9               ret
 372+ 9289
 373+ 9289              is_any_key_held:
 374+ 9289 21 08 91         ld      hl,Keys
 375+ 928C 06 28            ld      b,40
 376+ 928E 0E 00            ld      c,0
 377+ 9290              .KeyReadLoop:
 378+ 9290 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 379+ 9291 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 380+ 9293 FE 02            cp      2
 381+ 9295 CA 9F 92         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 382+ 9298 23               inc     hl
 383+ 9299 0C               inc     c
 384+ 929A 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 385+ 929C 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 386+ 929E C9               ret
 387+ 929F              .KeyPressed:
 388+ 929F 79               ld      a,c
 389+ 92A0 C9               ret
 390+ 92A1
 391+ 92A1
 392+ 92A1 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 393+ 92BF 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 394+ 92C0 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 395+ 92C1 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 396+ 92C2 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 397+ 92C3              InputLimit              EQU 20
 398+ 92C3
 399+ 92C3              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 400+ 92C3 21 A1 92         ld      hl,InputString
 401+ 92C6 3A C0 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 402+ 92C9 FE 00            cp      0
 403+ 92CB 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 404+ 92CD 4F               ld      c,a
 405+ 92CE 06 00            ld      b,0
 406+ 92D0 ED B0            ldir
 407+ 92D2              .NoString
 408+ 92D2 3E 00            ld      a,0
 409+ 92D4 12               ld      (de),a
 410+ 92D5 C9               ret
 411+ 92D6
 412+ 92D6              initInputText:
 413+ 92D6 AF               xor     a
 414+ 92D7 32 C0 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 415+ 92DA 32 C1 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 416+ 92DD 32 C2 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 417+ 92E0 21 A1 92         ld      hl,InputString
 418+ 92E3 06 1E            ld      b,30
 419+ 92E5              .wipeloop:
 420+ 92E5 77               ld      (hl),a
 421+ 92E6 23               inc     hl
 422+ 92E7 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 423+ 92E9 C9               ret
 424+ 92EA
 425+ 92EA              InputName:
 426+ 92EA AF               xor     a
 427+ 92EB 32 C2 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 428+ 92EE CD 73 92         call    is_any_key_pressed
 429+ 92F1 FE FF            cp      $FF
 430+ 92F3 C8               ret     z
 431+ 92F4              .KeyPressed:
 432+ 92F4 4F               ld      c,a
 433+ 92F5 3A C0 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 434+ 92F8 FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 435+ 92FA 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 436+ 92FC 21 98 91         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 437+ 92FF 79               ld      a,c
 438+ 9300 ED 31            add     hl,a
 439+ 9302 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 440+ 9303 FE 41            cp      "A"
 441+ 9305 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 442+ 9307              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 443+ 9307 FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 444+ 9309 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 445+ 930B FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 446+ 930D 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 447+ 930F FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 448+ 9311 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 449+ 9313 FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 450+ 9315 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 451+ 9317 FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 452+ 9319 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 453+ 931B C9               ret
 454+ 931C              .AlphaPressed:
 455+ 931C 47               ld      b,a
 456+ 931D 3A C0 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 457+ 9320 4F               ld      c,a
 458+ 9321 21 A1 92         ld      hl,InputString
 459+ 9324 ED 31            add     hl,a
 460+ 9326 78               ld      a,b
 461+ 9327 70               ld      (hl),b
 462+ 9328 79               ld      a,c
 463+ 9329 21 C0 92         ld      hl,InputCursor
 464+ 932C 34               inc     (hl)
 465+ 932D 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 466+ 932F 32 C2 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 467+ 9332 C9               ret
 468+ 9333              .EnterPressed:
 469+ 9333 3A C0 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 470+ 9336 3C               inc     a
 471+ 9337 21 A1 92         ld      hl,InputString
 472+ 933A ED 31            add     hl,a
 473+ 933C AF               xor     a
 474+ 933D 77               ld      (hl),a
 475+ 933E 3D               dec     a
 476+ 933F 32 C1 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 477+ 9342 32 C2 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 478+ 9345 C9               ret
 479+ 9346              .CheckShiftDelete:
 480+ 9346              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 481+ 9346              .SymbolPressed:
 482+ 9346              .SpacePressed:
 483+ 9346 3A C0 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 484+ 9349 FE 00            cp      0
 485+ 934B C8               ret     z
 486+ 934C 3D               dec     a
 487+ 934D 32 C0 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 488+ 9350 21 A1 92         ld      hl,InputString
 489+ 9353 ED 31            add     hl,a
 490+ 9355 AF               xor     a
 491+ 9356 77               ld      (hl),a
 492+ 9357 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 493+ 9359 32 C2 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 494+ 935C C9               ret
 495+ 935D
 496+ 935D              MovementKeyTest:
 497+ 935D              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 498+ 935D              ;dbx1:
 499+ 935D AF               xor     a
 500+ 935E 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 501+ 9361 3A 71 94         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 502+ 9364 E6 FC            and     $FC
 503+ 9366 20 26            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 504+ 9368              ClimbDiveKeys:
 505+ 9368 2A 56 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 506+ 936B 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 936C                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 507+ 936C A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 507+ 936D CA 7B 93    >				jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 508+ 9370 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 9373 F6 80            or      $80
 510+ 9375 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 9378 C3 B1 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 937B              ScanDiveKey:
 513+ 937B 2A 54 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 514+ 937E 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 515+ 937F                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 515+ 937F A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 515+ 9380 CA B1 93    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 516+ 9383 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 517+ 9386 F6 40            or      $40
 518+ 9388 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 519+ 938B C3 B1 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 520+ 938E              CursorKeys:
 521+ 938E 2A 92 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 522+ 9391 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 9392                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 523+ 9392 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 523+ 9393 CA A1 93    >				jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 524+ 9396 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 9399 F6 80            or      $80
 526+ 939B 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 939E C3 B1 93         jp      ScanLeftKey
 528+ 93A1              ScanCursorDownKey
 529+ 93A1 2A 94 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 530+ 93A4 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 531+ 93A5                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 531+ 93A5 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 531+ 93A6 CA B1 93    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 532+ 93A9 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 533+ 93AC F6 40            or      $40
 534+ 93AE 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 535+ 93B1              ScanLeftKey:
 536+ 93B1 2A 50 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 537+ 93B4 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 538+ 93B5                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 538+ 93B5 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 538+ 93B6 CA C2 93    >				jp	z, ScanRightKey
 539+ 93B9 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 540+ 93BC F6 20            or      $20
 541+ 93BE 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 542+ 93C1 C9               ret
 543+ 93C2              ScanRightKey:
 544+ 93C2 2A 52 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 545+ 93C5 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 546+ 93C6                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 546+ 93C6 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 546+ 93C7 CA D3 93    >				jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 547+ 93CA 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 93CD F6 10            or      $10
 549+ 93CF 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 93D2 C9               ret
 551+ 93D3              ScanHomeKey:
 552+ 93D3 2A 70 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 553+ 93D6 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 554+ 93D7                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 554+ 93D7 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 554+ 93D8 CA E4 93    >				jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 555+ 93DB 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 556+ 93DE F6 08            or      $08
 557+ 93E0 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 558+ 93E3 C9               ret
 559+ 93E4              ScanRecentreKey:
 560+ 93E4 2A 8C 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 561+ 93E7 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 562+ 93E8                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 562+ 93E8 A7          >                    and a
 562+ 93E9 C8          >                    ret    z
 563+ 93EA 3A 6F 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 564+ 93ED F6 04            or      $04
 565+ 93EF 32 6F 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 566+ 93F2 C9               ret
 567+ 93F3
 568+ 93F3
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm

   4+ 93F3              SignMask16Bit		equ %0111111111111111
   5+ 93F3              SignOnly8Bit		equ $80
   6+ 93F3              SignOnly16Bit		equ $8000
   7+ 93F3
   8+ 93F3              ConstPi				equ $80
   9+ 93F3              ConstNorm           equ 197

  13+ 93F3              BrabenBellToken 	equ $0D
  14+ 93F3              AcorToken			equ $0C

  18+ 93F3              RotationUnity		equ $60
  19+ 93F3              DBCheckCode			equ $DB
  20+ 93F3              MaxVisibility		equ $1F
  21+ 93F3              FarInFront			equ $C0

  24+ 93F3              ShipTypeStation     equ 2
  25+ 93F3              ShipTypeMissile     equ 1
  26+ 93F3              ShipTypeNormal      equ 0
  27+ 93F3
  28+ 93F3              MaxNumberOfStars	equ 11
  29+ 93F3              UniverseListSize    equ	12
  30+ 93F3              ShipTypeSize		equ	32 			;??????? just a guess for now

  33+ 93F3              ShipDataBasePage	equ	90			; Needs 2mb upgrade but what the heck

  35+ 93F3              LineLimitPerShip	equ 70			; Max lines per ship
  36+ 93F3              FaceLimitPerShip	equ	70			; Same as line limit to simplify some logic
  37+ 93F3              ; "NEED TO DEFINE SHIPTYPESIZE TODO"
  38+ 93F3              PlayerDocked		equ	$FF
  39+ 93F3
  40+ 93F3              ; Memory page managment	(Refers to a memory slot as a place to access data)
