  45+ 93F3
  46+ 93F3              ; Ship Data
  47+ 93F3              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
  48+ 93F3              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
  49+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
  50+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
  51+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
  52+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
  53+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
  54+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
  55+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
  56+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
  57+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
  58+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
  59+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
  60+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
  61+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
  62+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
  63+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
  64+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
  65+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
  66+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
  67+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder
  68+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 21 is
  69+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
  70+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
  71+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
  72+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
  73+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
  74+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is
  75+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 28 is	Last of three bounty hunters
  76+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 29 is #THG  Thargoid
  77+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
  78+ 93F3              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
  79+ 93F3              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
  80+ 93F3              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
  81+ 93F3              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
  82+ 93F3              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
  83+ 93F3              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
  84+ 93F3              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
  85+ 93F3              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.
  86+ 93F3

 382+ 94D0              ; For the UniverseSlot list, for an optimisation the type slot will be the ship type, e.g. ship type this will optimise searching for a station or star

 384+ 94D0              ; note this is ship type as it space station, transporter, pirate etc not model of ship

 445+ 9538 00 00 00...  DampingKeys				DS  7				; 0387 - 038D
 446+ 953F              ;  #&6 Does K toggle keyboard/joystick control -  03CD certainly makes keyboard not work anymore.
 447+ 953F              ;  #&5 Does J reverse both joystick channels
 448+ 953F              ;  #&4 Does Y reverse joystick Y channel			03CB
 449+ 953F              ;  #&3 Does F toggle flashing information			03CA
 450+ 953F              ;  #&2 Does X toggle startup message display ? PATG?	03C9
 451+ 953F              ;  #&1 Does A toggle keyboard auto-recentering ?
 452+ 953F              ;  #&0 Caps-lock toggles keyboard flight damping

   2+ 9792 21 DC 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
   3+ 9795 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseListSize * 2
   4+ 9797 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9798 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 9799 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 979B C9                                   ret
   8+ 979C
   9+ 979C              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot

  11+ 979C CD 91 97     CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  12+ 979F 21 DC 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  13+ 97A2 11 D0 94                             ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  14+ 97A5 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  15+ 97A7 1A           .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  16+ 97A8 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  17+ 97AA 28 05                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  18+ 97AC 77           .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  19+ 97AD 23                                   inc     hl
  20+ 97AE 36 01                                ld      (hl),1
  21+ 97B0 23                                   inc     hl
  22+ 97B1 13           .SkipSlot               inc     de
  23+ 97B2 10 F3                                djnz    .fillLoop

 866  9860                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9860              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9860              doRND2:
   3+ 9860 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9861              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9861              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9861 3A 03 94     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9864 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9866 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9867 21 05 94     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 986A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 986B 32 03 94     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 986E 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 986F 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9870 32 05 94                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9873 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9874 3A 04 94                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9877 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9878 21 06 94     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 987B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 987C 32 04 94                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 987F 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9880 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9881 32 06 94                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9884 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9885 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9886
  27+ 9886              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9886 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9888 21 FF C1     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 988B              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 988B              EE55:
  32+ 988B CD 61 98     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 988E 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 988F 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9890 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9892 C9               ret
  37+ 9893
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

  14+ 98B6 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 98B8
  16+ 98B8 21 30 95     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 98BB 11 64 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 98BE 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 98C0
  20+ 98C0 21 64 95     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 98C3 11 30 95                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 98C6 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 98C8
  24+ 98C8 21 64 95     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 98CB 11 51 94                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 98CE 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 98D0
  28+ 98D0 21 51 94     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 98D3 11 64 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 98D6 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 98D8
  32+ 98D8              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 98D8 CD DB 98     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 98DB              .NextStep:
  35+ 98DB CD DE 98     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 98DE              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 98DE 3A 51 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 98E1 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 98E2 21 53 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 98E5 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 98E6 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 98E7 3A 52 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 98EA 21 54 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 98ED 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 98EE 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 98EF 3A 53 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 98F2 32 51 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 98F5 3A 54 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 98F8 32 52 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 98FB 3A 56 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 98FE 32 54 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9901 3A 55 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9904 32 53 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9907 B7           		or		a
  55+ 9908 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9909 21 53 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 990C 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 990D 32 55 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9910 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9911 21 54 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9914 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9915 32 56 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9918 C9           		ret
  64+ 9919
  65+ 9919              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9919 CD 1C 99     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 991C              .NextStep:
  68+ 991C CD 1F 99     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 991F              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 991F              ; x = a + c
  71+ 991F 3A 64 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9922 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9923 21 66 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9926 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9927 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9928              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9928 3A 65 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 992B 21 67 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 992E 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 992F 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9930 3A 66 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9933 32 64 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9936 3A 67 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9939 32 65 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 993C 3A 69 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 993F 32 67 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9942 3A 68 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9945 32 66 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9948 B7           		or		a
  90+ 9949 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 994A 21 66 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 994D 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 994E 32 68 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9951 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9952 21 67 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9955 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9956 32 69 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9959 C9           		ret
  99+ 995A
 100+ 995A 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 995B 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 995C 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 995D
 104+ 995D AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 995E 32 6A 94                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9961              .CounterLoop:
 107+ 9961 3A 52 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 108+ 9964 4F           	ld		c,a
 109+ 9965              .calcLocaldy:
 110+ 9965 3A 2F 95     	ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 111+ 9968 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 112+ 9969 79           	ld		a,c
 113+ 996A 90           	sub		b
 114+ 996B CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 115+ 996D 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedy
 116+ 996F              .negativedy:
 117+ 996F ED 44        	neg
 118+ 9971              .positivedy:
 119+ 9971 32 5C 99     	ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 120+ 9974 ED 5B 5A 99  	ld		de,(working_distX)
 121+ 9978 BA           	cp		d
 122+ 9979 30 24        	jr		nc,.toofar
 123+ 997B              .calcLocaldx:
 124+ 997B 3A 54 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 125+ 997E 4F           	ld		c,a
 126+ 997F 3A 2E 95     	ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 127+ 9982 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 128+ 9983 79           	ld		a,c
 129+ 9984 90           	sub		b
 130+ 9985 CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 131+ 9987 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedx
 132+ 9989              .negativedx:
 133+ 9989 ED 44        	neg
 134+ 998B              .positivedx:
 135+ 998B 4F           	ld		c,a
 136+ 998C BB           	cp		e
 137+ 998D 30 10        	jr		nc,.toofar
 138+ 998F              .Nearer:									; we have a closer system
 139+ 998F 3A 5C 99     	ld		a,(current_distY)
 140+ 9992 47           	ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 141+ 9993 ED 43 5A 99  	ld		(working_distX),bc
 142+ 9997 C5           	push	bc
 143+ 9998 CD D0 98     	call 	copy_system_to_working
 144+ 999B C1           	pop		bc
 145+ 999C 78           	ld		a,b								;
 146+ 999D B1           	or		c								;
 147+ 999E C8           	ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 148+ 999F              .toofar:
 149+ 999F CD D8 98     	call	next_system_seed
 150+ 99A2 3A 6A 94     	ld		a,(XSAV)
 151+ 99A5 3D           	dec		a
 152+ 99A6 FE 00        	cp		0
 153+ 99A8 C8           	ret		z
 154+ 99A9 32 6A 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
 155+ 99AC 18 B3        	jr		.CounterLoop
 156+ 99AE
 157+ 99AE
 158+ 99AE              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 159+ 99AE 3A 65 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 160+ 99B1 E6 07        		and		7
 161+ 99B3 32 70 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 162+ 99B6 3A 66 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 163+ 99B9 CB 3F        		srl	a
 164+ 99BB CB 3F        		srl	a
 165+ 99BD CB 3F        		srl	a
 166+ 99BF CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 167+ 99C1 E6 07        		and		7
 168+ 99C3 32 71 95     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 169+ 99C6 CB 3F        		srl	a
 170+ 99C8 FE 00        		cp		0
 171+ 99CA 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 172+ 99CC              .Fedual:
 173+ 99CC 3A 70 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 174+ 99CF F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 175+ 99D1 32 70 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 176+ 99D4              .CanBeRich:
 177+ 99D4 3A 70 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 178+ 99D7 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 179+ 99D9 32 72 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 180+ 99DC 47           		ld		b,a
 181+ 99DD 3A 67 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 182+ 99E0 E6 03        		and		3
 183+ 99E2 80           		add		a,b
 184+ 99E3 32 72 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 185+ 99E6 3A 71 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 186+ 99E9 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 187+ 99EB 47           		ld		b,a
 188+ 99EC 3A 72 95     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 189+ 99EF 80           		add		a,b
 190+ 99F0 32 72 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 191+ 99F3 CB 27        		sla		a
 192+ 99F5 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 193+ 99F7 47           		ld		b,a
 194+ 99F8 3A 70 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 195+ 99FB 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 196+ 99FC 47           		ld		b,a
 197+ 99FD 3A 71 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 198+ 9A00 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 199+ 9A01 32 73 95     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 200+ 9A04 3A 70 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 201+ 9A07 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 202+ 9A09 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 203+ 9A0B 57           		ld		d,a
 204+ 9A0C 3A 71 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 205+ 9A0F C6 04        		add		4
 206+ 9A11 5F           		ld		e,a
 207+ 9A12 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 208+ 9A14 3A 73 95     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 209+ 9A17 57           		ld		d,a
 210+ 9A18 ED 30        		mul
 211+ 9A1A CB 23        		sla		e
 212+ 9A1C CB 1A        		rr		d
 213+ 9A1E CB 23        		sla		e
 214+ 9A20 CB 1A        		rr		d
 215+ 9A22 CB 23        		sla		e
 216+ 9A24 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 217+ 9A26 ED 53 75 95  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 218+ 9A2A              .DoRadius:
 219+ 9A2A 3A 67 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 220+ 9A2D 4F           		ld		c,a
 221+ 9A2E 3A 69 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 222+ 9A31 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 223+ 9A33 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 224+ 9A35 47           		ld		b,a							;
 225+ 9A36 ED 43 79 95  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 226+ 9A3A C9           		ret
 227+ 9A3B
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  35+ 9B81              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  36+ 9B81
  37+ 9B81
  38+ 9B81              getTableText:
  39+ 9B81              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9B81              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9B81 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9B82 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9B84 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9B86 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9B87 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9B88 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9B89 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9B8A D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9B8B C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9B8C
  51+ 9B8C
  52+ 9B8C              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9B8C              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9B8C              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9B8C              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9B8C              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9B8C              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9B8C              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9B8C              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9B8C              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9B8C 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9B8D B3           	or		e
  63+ 9B8E FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9B90 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9B91 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9B92 21 E0 9A     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9B95              .testLoop:
  68+ 9B95 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9B96 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9B97 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9B98 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9B99 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9B9A 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9B9B CD 5C A5     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9B9E 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9BA0              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9BA0 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9BA1 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9BA2 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9BA3 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9BA4 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9BA6              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9BA6 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9BA7 C9           	ret
  85+ 9BA8
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

  11+ 9BDB 46 75 65 6C  WordFuel            		DB  "Fuel",0               ;10

  12+ 9BE0 53 63 6F 6F  WordScoops          		DB  "Scoops",0             ;11
  12+ 9BE4 70 73 00
  13+ 9BE7 45 2E 43 2E  WordECM             		DB  "E.C.M.",0             ;12

 164+ 9FD1
 165+ 9FD1 00           TextDummy					DB  0
 166+ 9FD2
 167+ 9FD2 7A 9F 7E 9F  TextTokens			DW  TextLargeCargoBay, TextEscapePod, TextFuelScoops				; 0 2
 167+ 9FD6 81 9F
 168+ 9FD8 84 9F 87 9F  					DW  TextECMSystem, TextEnergyBomb, TextEnergyUnit					; 3 5
 168+ 9FDC 8A 9F
 169+ 9FDE 8D 9F 90 9F  					DW  TextDockingComp, TextGalacticHyper  							; 6 7
 170+ 9FE2 93 9F 97 9F  					DW	TextFrontLaser, TextLeftLaser, TextRightLaser, TextRearLaser	; 8 11
 170+ 9FE6 9B 9F 9F 9F
 171+ 9FEA A3 9F A7 9F  					DW  TextShortRangeChart, TextGalacticChart, TextDataOn				; 12 14
 171+ 9FEE AA 9F
 172+ 9FF0 AD 9F B0 9F  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 172+ 9FF4 B6 9F B3 9F
 172+ 9FF8 BF 9F B9 9F
 172+ 9FFC BC 9F C2 9F
 173+ A000 C5 9F        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 174+ A002 C8 9F CC 9F  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 175+ A006 D1 9F        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 176+ A008 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 177+ A029
 178+ A029              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A029              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A029
 181+ A029              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A029              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A029              .CapLoop:
 184+ A029 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A02A 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A02B FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A02D C8           	ret		z
 188+ A02E FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A030 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A032 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A034 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A036              .LowerCase:
 193+ A036 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A038 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A039 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A03B
 197+ A03B              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A03B 21 AC 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A03E ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A040 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A042 D5           	push	de
 202+ A043 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A044 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A045 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A046 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A047 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A048 C9           	ret
 208+ A049
 209+ A049
 210+ A049              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A049              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A049 21 D2 9F     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A04C CD 81 9B     	call	getTableText
 214+ A04F 11 08 A0     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A052              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A052 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A053 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A055 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A057 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A058 D5           	push	de
 221+ A059 21 AC 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A05C CD 81 9B     	call	getTableText
 223+ A05F D1           	pop		de
 224+ A060              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A060 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A061 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A063 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A065              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A065 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A066 13           	inc		de
 231+ A067 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A068 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A06A              .AddSpace:
 234+ A06A 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A06C 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A06D 13           	inc		de
 237+ A06E E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A06F 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A070 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A072              .ReadDone:
 241+ A072 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A073 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A074 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A075 C9           	ret
 245+ A076
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

  12+ A0EF              NamingLoop:
  13+ A0EF 3A 69 95     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ A0F2 E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ A0F4 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ A0F6 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ A0F8 C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ A0FA CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ A0FC 21 76 A0     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ A0FF ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ A101 ED A0        	ldi
  22+ A103 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ A104 FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ A106 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  25+ A108              .AddExtra:

  27+ A10A              .SkipPhrase:
  28+ A10A D5           	push	de
  29+ A10B CD 1F 99     	call	working_seed
  30+ A10E D1           	pop		de
  31+ A10F C9           	ret

 179+ A110              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc

 187+ A110              ;CA                      DEX

 192+ A110              ;CA                      DEX

 194+ A110              ;CA                      DEX

 196+ A110              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ A110              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ A110              ;60                      RTS
 199+ A110              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ A110              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ A110              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ A110              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ A110              ;60                      RTS
 204+ A110              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ A110              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ A110              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ A110              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ A110              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ A110              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ A110              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ A110              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ A110              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ A110              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ A110              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ A110              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A110              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A110              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A110              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A110              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A110              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A110              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A110              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A110              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A110              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A110              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A110              ;
 227+ A110              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A110              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A110              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A110              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A110              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A110              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A110              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A110              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A110              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A110              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A110              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A110              ;
 239+ A110              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A110              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A110              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A110              ;
 243+ A110              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A110              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A110              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A110              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A110              ;
 248+ A110              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A110              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A110              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A110              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A110              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A110              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A110              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A110              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A110              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A110              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A110              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A110              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A110              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A110              ;
 262+ A110              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A110              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A110              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A110              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A110              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A110              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A110              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A110              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A110              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.

 273+ A110              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token

 276+ A110              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160

 278+ A110              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index

 873  A110              ; Include all maths libraries to test assembly
 874  A110                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ A110              addhldesigned:
   2+ A110 CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ A112 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ A114 CD 62 A5             call    negate16hl
   5+ A117              .noneghl:
   6+ A117 CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ A119 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ A11B CD 69 A5             call    negate16de
   9+ A11E              .nonegde:
  10+ A11E 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ A11F AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ A120 CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ A122 C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ A123 CD 62 A5             call    negate16hl
  15+ A126 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ A128 C9                   ret
  17+ A129
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 875  A129                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A129
   2+ A129              ; a = value to add
   3+ A129              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ A129              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ A129              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ A129 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ A12C 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ A12D 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ A12E ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ A130 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ A131 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ A133 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ A134 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ A135 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ A137              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ A137              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ A137              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ A137              addhlcsigned:
  19+ A137 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ A138 23                   inc     hl
  21+ A139 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ A13A 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ A13B 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ A13C EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ A13D A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ A13E CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ A140 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ A142              .negativecalc:
  29+ A142 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ A143 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A145 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ A146 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ A148 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ A14A ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A14C DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ A14E EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ A14F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ A150 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ A152 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ A154 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ A156 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ A157 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ A158 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ A159 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ A15A 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ A15B 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ A15C EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ A15D D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ A15E              .nocarry:
  50+ A15E CD 62 A5             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ A161 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ A162 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ A163 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ A164 23                   inc     hl
  55+ A165 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ A166 23                   inc     hl
  57+ A167 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ A168 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ A169 C9                   ret
  60+ A16A              .postivecalc:
  61+ A16A DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ A16C 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ A16E 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ A16F EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ A170 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ A172 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ A173 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ A174 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ A175 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ A176 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ A177 C9                   ret
  72+ A178
  73+ A178              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ A178              ;MVT1
  75+ A178              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ A178              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ A178              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ A178              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ A178              ;
  80+ A178              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ A178              ;        b = 0
  82+ A178              ;        c = varS
  83+ A178              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ A178              ;        retain carry
  85+ A178              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ A178              ;        and 7F
  87+ A178              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ A178              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ A178              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ A178              ;
  91+ A178              ;    else
  92+ A178              ;MV10.
  93+ A178              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ A178              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ A178
  96+ A178
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 876  A178                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ A178              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A178 2A 2A 98     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A17B 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A17C 22 2A 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A17F 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A182 2A 2C 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A185 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A187 22 2C 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A18A C9                                   ret
  10+ A18B
  11+ A18B 2A 2A 98     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A18E 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A18F B5                                   or      l
  14+ A190 2A 2C 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A193 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A194 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A195 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A196 B7                                   or      a
  19+ A197 2A 2A 98                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A19A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A19C 22 2A 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A19F 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A1A2 2A 2C 98                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A1A5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A1A7 22 2C 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A1AA                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A1AA CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A1AC C2 B0 A1    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A1AF C9                                   ret
  28+ A1B0 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A1B3 22 2A 98                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A1B6 22 2C 98                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A1B9 C9                                   ret
  32+ A1BA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
 877  A1BA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A1BA              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A1BA 2A 66 94                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A1BD 3A 65 94                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A1C0 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A1C2 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A1C5 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A1C6                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A1C6 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A1C8 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A1CA CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A1CC 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A1CE EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A1CF 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A1D0 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A1D1              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A1D1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A1D3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A1D5 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A1D7 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A1D9 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A1DB EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A1DC D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A1DE C9                                   ret
  20+ A1DF
  21+ A1DF
  22+ A1DF              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A1DF ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A1DF ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A1DF ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A1DF ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A1DF ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A1DF ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A1DF ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A1DF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A1DF ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A1DF ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A1DF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A1DF ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A1DF ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A1DF ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A1DF ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A1DF ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A1DF                                      ENDM
  40+ A1DF
  41+ A1DF
  42+ A1DF
  43+ A1DF                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A1DF              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A1DF 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A1E0 3A 65 94    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A1E3 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A1E4 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A1E5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A1E7 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A1E8 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A1E9 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A1EB 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A1EC 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A1ED E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A1EF 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A1F0 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A1F2 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A1F3 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A1F4 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A1F5 2A 66 94     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A1F8 CD 01 A2                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A1FB EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A1FC                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A1FC B7          >                    or a
  49+ A1FD DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A1FF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A200 C9                                   ret
  52+ A201
  53+ A201
  54+ A201 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A202 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A204 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A205 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A206                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A206 FA 1E A2    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A209 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A20A B2                                   or      d
  61+ A20B                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A20B FA 10 A2    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A20E 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A20F C9                                   ret
  64+ A210 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A211 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A213 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A214 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A215 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A217 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A218 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A219 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A21B B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A21C 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A21D C9                                   ret
  75+ A21E 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A21F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A221 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A222 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A223 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A225 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A226 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A227 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A229 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A22B 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A22C B4                                   or      h
  86+ A22D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A22E C9                                   ret
  88+ A22F              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A22F AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A230 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A231 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A232 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A233 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A234 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A235 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A236 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A238 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A239 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A23A C9                                   ret
  94+ A23B
  95+ A23B
  96+ A23B                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A23B                  ;
  98+ A23B                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A23B                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A23B                  ;
 101+ A23B                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A23B                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A23B                  ;
 104+ A23B                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A23B 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A23C 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A23D ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A23F EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A240 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A242
 111+ A242 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A243 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A244 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A245 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A246
 116+ A246 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A247 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A249 C9                                   ret
 119+ A24A
 120+ A24A
 121+ A24A
 122+ A24A                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A24A                 ;
 124+ A24A                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A24A                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A24A                 ;
 127+ A24A                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A24A                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A24A                 ;
 130+ A24A                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A24A
 132+ A24A
 133+ A24A
 134+ A24A 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A24B 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A24C 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A24D 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A24E E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A24F 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A250              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A250 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A252 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A253 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A255
 145+ A255 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A256 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A257 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A258
 149+ A258 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A259 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A25A ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A25C
 153+ A25C 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A25D 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A25E
 156+ A25E 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A25F 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A260 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A261 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A262
 161+ A262 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A263 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A265
 164+ A265 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A266 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A268 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A269
 168+ A269 C9                                   ret
 169+ A26A
 170+ A26A              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A26A              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A26A              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A26A              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A26A              ;         carry reset
 175+ A26A              ; maths is
 176+ A26A              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A26A              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A26A              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A26A              ;
 180+ A26A              ;
 181+ A26A              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A26A C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A26B 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A26C 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A26D 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A26E 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A26F 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A270 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A272 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A273 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A275 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A276 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A277 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A278 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A27A 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A27B 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A27C 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A27D 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A27E                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A27E AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A27F C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A280 C9                                   ret
 203+ A281
 204+ A281              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A281              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A281              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A281              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A281              ;         carry reset
 209+ A281              ;
 210+ A281              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A281 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A282 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A283 32 81 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A286 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A287 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A28A 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A28C E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A28E 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A28F 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A291 32 81 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A294 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A295 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A298 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A29A E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A29C 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A29D 3A 81 A2                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A2A0 EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A2A2 32 81 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A2A5 CD 6A A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A2A8 3A 81 A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A2AB ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A2AE C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A2AF AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A2B0 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A2B1 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A2B2 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A2B3 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A2B4 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A2B5 C9                                   ret
 240+ A2B6
 241+ A2B6 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A2B7 32 81 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A2BA 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A2BB ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A2BE 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A2C0 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A2C2 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A2C3 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A2C5 32 81 A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A2C8 CD 6A A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A2CB 3A 81 A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A2CE ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A2D1 C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A2D2 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A2D3 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A2D4 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A2D5 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A2D6 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A2D7 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A2D8 C9                                   ret
 261+ A2D9
 262+ A2D9
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 878  A2D9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A2D9              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A2D9              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A2D9
   4+ A2D9              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A2D9 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A2D9 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A2D9 ~            			mul
   8+ A2D9              			ENDM
   9+ A2D9
  10+ A2D9              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A2D9 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A2D9 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A2D9 ~            			mul
  14+ A2D9 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A2D9              			ENDM
  16+ A2D9
  17+ A2D9
  18+ A2D9              asm_squa:
  19+ A2D9 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A2DB              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A2DB              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A2DB              asm_squa2:
  23+ A2DB 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A2DC 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A2DD ED 30        	mul
  26+ A2DF ED 53 0A 94  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A2E3 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A2E4 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 879  A2E5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A2E5              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A2E5              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A2E5              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A2E5              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A2E5              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A2E5              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A2E5 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A2E8 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A2E9 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A2EA              .sqrloop:
  11+ A2EA CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A2EC CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A2EE 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A2EF EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A2F0 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A2F2 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A2F4 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A2F5 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A2F6 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A2F8              .sqrbit:
  21+ A2F8 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A2F9 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A2FA B7           	or a
  24+ A2FB ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A2FD              .sqrfi:
  26+ A2FD CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A2FF CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A301 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A303 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A305 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A307 C9           	ret
  32+ A308
  33+ A308
  34+ A308              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A308 3A 65 94     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A30B 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A30C 3A 66 94     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A30F 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A310 CD E5 A2     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A313 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A314 32 65 94     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A317 C9           	ret
  43+ A318
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 880  A318                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A318              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A318              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A318              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A318              ;
   5+ A318              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A318              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A318              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A318              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A318              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A318              ;;;    rla
  11+ A318              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A318              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A318              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A318              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A318              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A318              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A318              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A318              ;;;    rla
  19+ A318              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A318              ;;;    ret
  21+ A318
  22+ A318              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A318              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A318              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A318              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A318              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A318              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A318              ;140 bytes
  29+ A318              ;145cc
  30+ A318
  31+ A318              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A318 ~                                rla
  33+ A318 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A318 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A318 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A318 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A318                                  ENDM
  38+ A318
  39+ A318              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A318 AF               xor a
  41+ A319 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A31B 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A31C                  MacroDEDivBC
  43+ A31C 17          >                    rla
  43+ A31D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A31F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A321 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A323 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A324                  MacroDEDivBC
  44+ A324 17          >                    rla
  44+ A325 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  44+ A327 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  44+ A329 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  44+ A32B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  45+ A32C                  MacroDEDivBC
  45+ A32C 17          >                    rla
  45+ A32D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  45+ A32F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  45+ A331 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  45+ A333 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  46+ A334                  MacroDEDivBC
  46+ A334 17          >                    rla
  46+ A335 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  46+ A337 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  46+ A339 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3

  47+ A33F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  47+ A341 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  47+ A343 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  48+ A344 17          >                    rla

  48+ A347 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  48+ A349 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  48+ A34B 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  49+ A34C 17          >                    rla

  49+ A34F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

  56+ A363 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

  57+ A36B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  57+ A36D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  57+ A36F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  58+ A370                  MacroDEDivBC
  58+ A370 17          >                    rla
  58+ A371 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  58+ A373 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  58+ A375 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  58+ A377 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  59+ A378                  MacroDEDivBC
  59+ A378 17          >                    rla
  59+ A379 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  59+ A37B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  59+ A37D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  59+ A37F 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  60+ A380 17          >                    rla

  60+ A383 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  60+ A385 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  60+ A387 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  61+ A388                  MacroDEDivBC
  61+ A388 17          >                    rla
  61+ A389 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  61+ A38B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  61+ A38D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  61+ A38F 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  62+ A390 17          >                    rla
  62+ A391 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  62+ A393 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  62+ A395 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  62+ A397 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  63+ A398                  MacroDEDivBC
  63+ A398 17          >                    rla
  63+ A399 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  63+ A39B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  63+ A39D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  63+ A39F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  64+ A3A0 17               rla
  65+ A3A1 2F               cpl
  66+ A3A2 5F               ld e,a
  67+ A3A3 C9               ret
  68+ A3A4
  69+ A3A4
  70+ A3A4
  71+ A3A4              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A3A4              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A3A4              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A3A4              ; Our use
  75+ A3A4              ; BC = A0
  76+ A3A4              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A3A4              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A3A4              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A3A4 B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A3A5 D2 D0 A3    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A3A8 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A3A9 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A3AA 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A3AC 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A3AE C3 BB A3                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A3B1 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A3B2 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A3B4 21 65 94                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A3B7 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A3B8 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A3BA 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A3BB              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A3BB 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A3BE 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A3BF 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A3C1 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A3C3 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A3C4 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A3C6 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A3C8 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A3CA 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A3CB 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A3CC 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A3CE 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A3CF C9                                   ret
 104+ A3D0 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A3D3 C9                                   ret
 106+ A3D4
 107+ A3D4              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A3D4 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A3D6 AF                                   xor a
 110+ A3D7 CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A3D9 17                                   rla
 112+ A3DA BA                                   cp d
 113+ A3DB 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A3DD
 114+ A3DD 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A3DE 92                                   sub d
 116+ A3DF 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A3E1 C9                                   ret
 118+ A3E2              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A3E2 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A3E4 AF                                   xor a
 121+ A3E5 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A3E7 CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A3E9              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A3E9 17                                   rla
 125+ A3EA B9                                   cp c
 126+ A3EB 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A3ED 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A3EE 91                                   sub c
 129+ A3EF 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A3F1 C9                                   ret
 131+ A3F2              ;
 132+ A3F2              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A3F2              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A3F2              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A3F2              ;
 136+ A3F2              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A3F2 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A3F2 ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A3F2 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A3F2 ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A3F2 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A3F2 ~            1:
 143+ A3F2 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A3F2              					ENDM
 145+ A3F2
 146+ A3F2
 147+ A3F2
 148+ A3F2              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A3F2 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A3F5 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A3F6 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A3F8 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A3F9 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A3FB ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A3FD 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A3FF 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A400 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A402 17                               rla
 159+ A403 2F                               cpl
 160+ A404 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A405 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A406 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A407 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A409 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A40A ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A40C ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A40E 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A410 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A411 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A413 17                               rla
 171+ A414 2F                               cpl
 172+ A415 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A416 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A417 C9                               ret
 175+ A418
 176+ A418
 177+ A418
 178+ A418              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A418 ~            				   rla
 180+ A418 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A418 ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A418 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A418 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A418 ~            1:
 185+ A418              				   ENDM
 186+ A418
 187+ A418
 188+ A418              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A418              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A418              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A418              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A418              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A418              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A418              ;144 bytes
 195+ A418 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A419 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A41A 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A41B 93                                   sub e
 199+ A41C 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A41D 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A41E 92                                   sub d
 202+ A41F 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A420 78                                   ld a,b
 204+ A421                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 204+ A421 17          >				   rla
 204+ A422 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 204+ A424 19          >				   add	hl,de
 204+ A425 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 204+ A427 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 204+ A429             >1:
 205+ A429                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 205+ A429 17          >				   rla
 205+ A42A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 205+ A42C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 205+ A42D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 205+ A42F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 205+ A431             >1:
 206+ A431                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 206+ A431 17          >				   rla
