 219+ A482 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 219+ A484             >1:
 220+ A484                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 220+ A484 17          >				   rla
 220+ A485 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 220+ A487 19          >				   add	hl,de
 220+ A488 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 220+ A48A ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 220+ A48C             >1:
 221+ A48C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 221+ A48C 17          >				   rla
 221+ A48D ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 221+ A48F 19          >				   add	hl,de
 221+ A490 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 221+ A492 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 221+ A494             >1:
 222+ A494                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 222+ A494 17          >				   rla
 222+ A495 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 222+ A497 19          >				   add	hl,de
 222+ A498 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 222+ A49A ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ A49C             >1:
 223+ A49C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A49C 17          >				   rla
 223+ A49D ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A49F 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A4A0 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A4A2 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A4A4             >1:
 224+ A4A4 17                                   rla
 225+ A4A5 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A4A6 C9                                   ret
 227+ A4A7
 228+ A4A7              ;Inputs:
 229+ A4A7              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A4A7              ;Outputs:
 231+ A4A7              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A4A7              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A4A7              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A4A7              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A4A7              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A4A7              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A4A7              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A4A7 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A4A8 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A4A9 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A4AA              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A4AA A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A4AB F2 B4 A4                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A4AE AF                                   xor a
 245+ A4AF 91                                   sub c
 246+ A4B0 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A4B1 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A4B2 90                                   sub b
 249+ A4B3 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A4B4 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A4B5 B2                                   or d
 252+ A4B6 FA BF A4                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A4B9 AF                                   xor a
 254+ A4BA 93                                   sub e
 255+ A4BB 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A4BC 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A4BD 92                                   sub d
 258+ A4BE 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A4BF B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A4C0 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A4C2 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A4C4 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A4C5 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A4C6 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A4C7 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A4C8 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A4CA 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A4CB 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A4CC CD E7 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A4CF 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A4D0 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A4D1 CD E7 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A4D4 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A4D5 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A4D6 F1                                   pop af
 276+ A4D7 F0                                   ret p
 277+ A4D8 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A4D9 93                                   sub e
 279+ A4DA 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A4DB 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A4DC 92                                   sub d
 282+ A4DD 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A4DE C9                                   ret
 284+ A4DF
 285+ A4DF 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A4E2 F1                                   pop af
 287+ A4E3 F0                                   ret p
 288+ A4E4 13                                   inc de
 289+ A4E5 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A4E6 C9                                   ret
 291+ A4E7
 292+ A4E7              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A4E7              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A4E7              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A4E7 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A4E9 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A4EA ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A4EC 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A4ED 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A4EF ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A4F1 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A4F3 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A4F4 C9                                   ret
 304+ A4F5
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 881  A4F5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A4F5              asm_tis2:
   2+ A4F5              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A4F5              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A4F5 F5           	push af
   5+ A4F6 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A4F8 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A4F9 3A 65 94     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A4FC 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A4FD 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A4FE BB           	cp e
  11+ A4FF 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A501 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A503 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A505 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A506 3A 65 94     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A509 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A50A CD E2 A3     	call asm_div16
  18+ A50D F1           	pop af
  19+ A50E E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A510 B5           	or l
  21+ A511 C9           	ret
  22+ A512              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A512 F1           	pop af
  24+ A513 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A515 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A517 C9           	ret
  27+ A518
  28+ A518
  29+ A518              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A518              squareregfx:
  31+ A518 3A 75 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A51B 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A51C 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A51D ED 30        	mul
  35+ A51F EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A520              squareregfy:
  37+ A520 3A 77 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A523 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A524 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A525 ED 30        	mul
  41+ A527 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A528              squareregfz:
  43+ A528 3A 79 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A52B 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A52C 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A52D ED 30        	mul
  47+ A52F 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A530 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A531              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A531 CD E5 A2     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A534 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A535 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A536 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A537              normfx:
  55+ A537 3A 75 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A53A E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A53B 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A53C 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A53D CD F5 A4     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A540 32 75 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A543              normfy:
  62+ A543 3A 77 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A546 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A547 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A548 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A549 CD F5 A4     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A54C 32 77 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A54F              normfz:
  69+ A54F 3A 79 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A552 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A553 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A554 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A555 CD F5 A4     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A558 32 79 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A55B              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A55B C9           	ret
  77+ A55C
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 882  A55C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A55C              compare16HLDE:
   2+ A55C              ; Input:
   3+ A55C              ;       HL = 1st value
   4+ A55C              ;       DE = 2nd value
   5+ A55C              ; Output:
   6+ A55C              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   7+ A55C              ;
   8+ A55C              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   9+ A55C              ;               -----------------------------------
  10+ A55C              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  11+ A55C              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  12+ A55C              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  13+ A55C              ;               1       1       Impossible
  14+ A55C              ;
  15+ A55C E5           		push    hl
  16+ A55D A7           		and     a
  17+ A55E ED 52        		sbc     hl,de
  18+ A560 E1           		pop     hl
  19+ A561 C9           		ret
  20+ A562
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 883  A562                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A562              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A562              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A562              negate16:
   4+ A562              negate16hl:
   5+ A562                      ; Input:
   6+ A562                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A562                      ; Output:
   8+ A562                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A562                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A562                      ;       AF
  11+ A562                      ;
  12+ A562 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A563 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A564 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A565 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A566 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A567 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A568 C9           	ret
  19+ A569
  20+ A569              negate16de:
  21+ A569 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A56A 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A56B 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A56C 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A56D 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A56E 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A56F C9           	ret
  28+ A570
  29+ A570              negate16bc:
  30+ A570 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A571 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A572 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A573 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A574 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A575 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A576 C9           	ret
  37+ A577
  38+ A577
  39+ A577              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A577 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A577 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A577 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A577 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A577 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A577 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A577              					ENDM
  47+ A577
  48+ A577              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ A577 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ A577 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A577 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A577 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A577 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A577 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A577              					ENDM
  56+ A577              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A577 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A577 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A577 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A577 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A577 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A577 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A577              					ENDM
  64+ A577
  65+ A577              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ A577 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ A577 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A577 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A577 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A577 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A577 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A577              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 884  A577                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A577 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A579                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A579 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A57A D2 8F A5    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A57D 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A57E CD D4 A3                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A581 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A582 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A584 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A585 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A587 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A588 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A589 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A58B E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A58D B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A58E C9                                   ret
  15+ A58F              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A58F              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A58F DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A591 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A593 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A595 C9                                   ret
  21+ A596
  22+ A596
  23+ A596
  24+ A596
  25+ A596              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A596                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A596 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A599 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A59B E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A59D              N96SQX:
  31+ A59D              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A59D 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A59E 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A59F ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A5A1 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A5A2 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A5A3              N96SQY:
  35+ A5A3 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A5A6 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A5A8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A5AA              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A5AA 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A5AB 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A5AC ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A5AE 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A5AF              N96SQZ:
  41+ A5AF 3A 77 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A5B2 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A5B4 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A5B6              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A5B6 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A5B7 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A5B8 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A5BA              N96SQADD:
  46+ A5BA 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A5BB EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A5BC              N96SQRT:
  49+ A5BC CD E5 A2     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A5BF              N96NORMX:
  51+ A5BF 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A5C2 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A5C4 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A5C5 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A5C6 CD A3 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A5C9 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A5CA DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A5CC E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A5CE B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A5CF 32 75 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A5D2              N96NORMY:
  62+ A5D2 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A5D5 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A5D7 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A5D8 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A5D9 CD A3 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A5DC 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A5DD DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A5DF E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A5E1 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A5E2 32 76 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A5E5              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A5E5 3A 77 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A5E8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A5EA 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A5EB 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A5EC CD A3 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A5EF 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A5F0 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A5F2 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A5F4 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A5F5 32 77 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A5F8 C9           	ret
  84+ A5F9
  85+ A5F9              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  86+ A5F9 3A 75 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  87+ A5FC                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  87+ A5FC 5F          >			ld	e,a
  87+ A5FD 57          >			ld  d,a
  87+ A5FE ED 30       >			mul
  88+ A600 7A                                   ld		a,d
  89+ A601 32 66 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  90+ A604 7B                                   ld		a,e
  91+ A605 32 65 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  92+ A608 32 0A 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  93+ A60B 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  94+ A60E                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ A60E 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ A60F 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ A610 ED 30       >			mul
  95+ A612 7A                                   ld		a,d
  96+ A613 32 85 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  97+ A616 7B                                   ld		a,e
  98+ A617 32 0A 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  99+ A61A 21 65 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 100+ A61D 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 101+ A61E 32 65 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 102+ A621 3A 85 94                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 103+ A624 21 66 94                             ld		hl,varR
 104+ A627 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 105+ A628 32 66 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 106+ A62B 3A 77 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 107+ A62E                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 107+ A62E 5F          >			ld	e,a
 107+ A62F 57          >			ld  d,a
 107+ A630 ED 30       >			mul
 108+ A632 7A                                   ld		a,d
 109+ A633 32 85 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 110+ A636 7B                                   ld		a,e
 111+ A637 32 0A 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 112+ A63A 21 65 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 113+ A63D 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 114+ A63E 32 65 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 115+ A641 3A 85 94                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 116+ A644 21 66 94                             ld		hl,varR
 117+ A647 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 118+ A648 32 66 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 119+ A64B CD 08 A3                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 120+ A64E 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 121+ A651 CD 9D A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 122+ A654 32 75 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 123+ A657 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 124+ A65A CD 9D A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 125+ A65D 32 76 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 126+ A660 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 127+ A663 CD 9D A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 128+ A666 32 76 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 129+ A669 C9                                   ret
 130+ A66A
 131+ A66A
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 885  A66A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A66A              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A66A              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A66A              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A66A              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A66A              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A66A              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A66A              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A66A 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A66D CD 83 A6     	call	Num1
  10+ A670 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A673 CD 83 A6     	call	Num1
  12+ A676 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A679 CD 83 A6     	call	Num1
  14+ A67C 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A67E CD 83 A6     	call	Num1
  16+ A681 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A683              Num1:
  18+ A683 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A685              .Num2:
  20+ A685 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A686 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A687 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A689 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A68B 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A68C 13           	inc	de
  26+ A68D C9           	ret
  27+ A68E
  28+ A68E              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A68E 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A690 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A691 C3 6A A6     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A694
  33+ A694              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A694 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A696 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A697 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A69A CD AA A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A69D 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A69F CD 83 A6     	call	Num1
  40+ A6A2 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A6A4 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A6A5 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A6A6 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A6A8 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A6AA              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A6AA 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A6AC              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A6AC 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A6AD 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A6AE 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A6B0 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A6B2 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A6B4              .Blank:
  54+ A6B4 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A6B6              .DontBlank:
  56+ A6B6 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A6B8 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A6B9 13           	inc	de
  59+ A6BA C9           	ret
  60+ A6BB
  61+ A6BB              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A6BB FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A6BD 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A6BF 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A6C1 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A6C2 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A6C5 CD D1 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A6C8 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A6CA CD D1 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A6CD 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A6CF 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A6D1              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A6D1 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A6D3              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A6D3 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A6D4 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A6D5 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A6D7 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A6D9 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A6DB              .Blank:
  81+ A6DB 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A6DD              .DontBlank:
  83+ A6DD ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A6DF 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A6E0 13           	inc	de
  86+ A6E1 C9           	ret
  87+ A6E2              .NoStock:
  88+ A6E2 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A6E4 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A6E5 13           	inc	de
  91+ A6E6 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A6E7 13           	inc	de
  93+ A6E8 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A6EA 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A6EB 13           	inc de
  96+ A6EC C9           	ret
  97+ A6ED
  98+ A6ED
  99+ A6ED              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A6ED              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A6ED              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A6ED              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A6ED 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A6F1 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A6F5 64 00 00 00
 103+ A6F9 E8 03 00 00
 103+ A6FD 10 27 00 00
 104+ A701 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A705 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A709 80 96 98 00
 104+ A70D 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A711 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A715 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A719
 107+ A719              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A719 CD 28 A7     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A71C FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A71F FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A722 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A724 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A727 C9                                   ret
 114+ A728
 115+ A728 DD 22 15 A7  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A72C ED 53 17 A7                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A730 DD 21 11 A7                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A734 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A736 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A738 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A73A B7                                   or a
 122+ A73B DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A73E DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A741 2A 15 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A744 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A746 22 15 A7                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A749 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A74C DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A74F 2A 17 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A752 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A754 22 17 A7                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A757 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A759 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A75A 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A75B 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A75D DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A760 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A763 2A 15 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A766 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A767 22 15 A7                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A76A DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A76D DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A770 2A 17 A7                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A773 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A775 22 17 A7                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A778 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A77B DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A77D 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A77E 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A77F 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A781 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A784 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A786 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A788 3A 15 A7                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A78B C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A78D FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A790 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A794 C9                                   ret
 159+ A795
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 886  A795              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 887  A795              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 888  A795                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A795
   2+ A795              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A795              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A795              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A795 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A797 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A799 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A79B CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A79D              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A79D              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A79D              TIS2:
  12+ A79D 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A79E 3A 65 94     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A7A1 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A7A2 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A7A3              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A7A3 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A7A4 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A7A6              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A7A6 BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A7A7 D2 C7 A7    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A7AA 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A7AC              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A7AC CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A7AE              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A7AE BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A7AF DA CD A7    >                        jp		c, TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A7B2 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A7B3 37           	scf
  26+ A7B4 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A7B6 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A7B8              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A7B8 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A7B9 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A7BB CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A7BD 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A7BE CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A7C0 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A7C1 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A7C2 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A7C3 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A7C5 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A7C6 C9           	ret
  40+ A7C7              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A7C7              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A7C7 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A7C8 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A7CA F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A7CC C9           	ret
  46+ A7CD              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A7CD B7           	or			a
  48+ A7CE CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A7D0 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A7D2 C3 B8 A7     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A7D5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 889  A7D5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A7D5              fmltu:
   2+ A7D5              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A7D5              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A7D5 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A7D6 3A 65 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A7D9 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A7DA ED 30        	mul
   8+ A7DC 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A7DD C9           	ret
  10+ A7DE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 890  A7DE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A7DE              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A7DE              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A7DE 21 52 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A7E1 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A7E3 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A7E5 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A7E6 C3 F2 A7     		jp		DV41
   8+ A7E9              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A7E9 21 52 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A7EC 3A F8 93     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A7EF ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A7F1 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A7F2              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A7F2 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A7F3 3A 61 94     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A7F6              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A7F6 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A7F8 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A7FA 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A7FB AF           		xor		a
  21+ A7FC              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A7FC CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A7FE 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A800 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A801 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A803              DV8:
  27+ A803 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A804 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A805              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A805 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A807 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A809              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A809              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A809 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A80B 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A80C              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A80C CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A80E 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A810 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A811 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A813              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A813 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A814              .DontSBC:
  44+ A814 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A816 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A818 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A819 32 66 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A81C 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A81D 32 0A 94     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A820 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A821              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A821 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A822 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A823 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A825 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A827 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A828 32 66 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A82B 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A82C 32 0A 94     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A82F C9           		ret
  61+ A830              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A830 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A832 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A833 32 66 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A836 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A837 32 0A 94     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A83A C9           		ret
  68+ A83B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 891  A83B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A83B
   2+ A83B              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A83B              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A83B              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A83B ED 30        	mul
   6+ A83D 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A83E C9           	ret
   8+ A83F
   9+ A83F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 892  A83F              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 893  A83F              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 894  A83F              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 895  A83F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A83F              APequQmulA:
   2+ A83F              asm_mult1:
   3+ A83F              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A83F FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A841 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A843 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A844 3A 65 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A847 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A848 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A84A 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A84C AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A84D E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A84F 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A850 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A851 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A853 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A854 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A855 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A857 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A858 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A85A 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A85B 32 0A 94     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A85E 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A85F B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A860 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A861 C9           	ret
  27+ A862              .mul0:
  28+ A862 AF           	xor	a
  29+ A863 32 0A 94     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A866 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A867 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A868 C9           	ret
  33+ A869
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 896  A869                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A869              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A869              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A869              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A869              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A869              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A869              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A869              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A869              LL38:
   9+ A869              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A869              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A869              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A869              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A869              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A869              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A869              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A869              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A869              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A869              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A869              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A869              ;	ret
  21+ A869              ; calculation table
  22+ A869              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A869              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A869              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A869              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A869              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A869              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A869              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A869              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A869              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A869
  32+ A869              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A869              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A869              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A869              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A869
  37+ A869
  38+ A869              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A869 21 67 94     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A86C AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A86D FA 78 A8     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A870 3A 65 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A873 21 66 94     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A876 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A877 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A878              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A878 3A 66 94     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A87B 21 65 94     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A87E              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A87E              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A87E B7          >                    or a
  51+ A87F 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A880 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A882              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A882              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A882              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A882 C9           	ret
  57+ A883              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A883 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A885 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A887 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A889 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A88A 3A 67 94     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A88D EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A88F 32 67 94     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A892 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A893                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A893 B7          >                    or a
  67+ A894 C9           	ret
  68+ A895              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A895 32 67 94         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A898                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A898 B7          >                    or a
  71+ A899 C9               ret
  72+ A89A              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A89A              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A89A              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A89A              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A89A              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A89A              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A89A              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A89A              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A89A              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A89A              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A89A              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A89A              ;--	ret
  84+ A89A
  85+ A89A              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A89A              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A89A              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A89A              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A89A              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A89A              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A89A              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A89A              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A89A              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A89A              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A89A              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A89A              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A89A              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A89A              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A89A              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A89A              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A89A              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A89A              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A89A              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A89A              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A89A              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A89A              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A89A              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A89A              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A89A              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A89A              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A89A              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A89A              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A89A              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A89A              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A89A              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A89A              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A89A              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A89A              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A89A              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A89A              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A89A              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A89A              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A89A              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A89A              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A89A
 142+ A89A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 897  A89A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ A89A              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ A89A              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A89A              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ A89A
   5+ A89A
   6+ A89A              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ A89A 3A F8 93     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ A89D 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A89E              moveship4breg:
  10+ A89E              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ A89E              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ A89E              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ A89E 3A 23 94     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A8A1 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ A8A4 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ A8A7 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ A8A8 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ A8AA 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ A8AB 32 66 94     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ A8AE 23           		inc		hl
  21+ A8AF 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ A8B0 32 67 94     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ A8B3 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ A8B4 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ A8B5 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ A8B6 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ A8B7 32 0A 94     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ A8BA 23           		inc		hl
  29+ A8BB 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ A8BC EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ A8BE CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ A8C1 23                   inc     hl
  33+ A8C2 23                   inc     hl
  34+ A8C3 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ A8C4 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ A8C5 3A F7 93             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ A8C8 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ A8C9 32 0A 94             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ A8CC 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ A8CD 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ A8CE 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ A8CF 32 66 94             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ A8D2 23                   inc     hl
  44+ A8D3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ A8D4 32 67 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ A8D7 23                   inc     hl
  47+ A8D8 23                   inc     hl
  48+ A8D9 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ A8DA CD DF A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ A8DD 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ A8DE 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ A8DF 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ A8E0 3A F7 93             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ A8E3 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ A8E4 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ A8E5 32 0A 94             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ A8E8 3A 15 94             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ A8EB 32 65 94             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ A8EE 23                   inc     hl
  60+ A8EF 23                   inc     hl
  61+ A8F0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ A8F1 32 66 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ A8F4 23                   inc     hl
  64+ A8F5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ A8F6 32 67 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ A8F9 23                   inc     hl
  67+ A8FA 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ A8FB 32 0A 94             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ A8FE 23                   inc     hl
  70+ A8FF 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ A900 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ A902 CD DF A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ A905 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ A906 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ A907 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ A908 3A F7 93             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ A90B 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ A90C 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ A90D 32 0A 94             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ A910 23                   inc     hl
  81+ A911 23                   inc     hl
  82+ A912 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ A913 32 66 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ A916 23                   inc     hl
  85+ A917 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ A918 32 67 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ A91B 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ A91C 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ A91D 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ A91E CD DF A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ A921 23                   inc     hl
  92+ A922 23                   inc     hl

 902  A92A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ A92A              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A92A              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A92A              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A92A              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A92A              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A92A              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A92A              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A92A              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A92A              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A92A              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A92A              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A92A              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A92A              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A92A              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A92A              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A92A              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A92A              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A92A              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A92A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A92A              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A92A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A92A              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A92A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A92A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A92A              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A92A              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A92A              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A92A              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A92A              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A92A              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A92A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A92A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A92A              ;;;	ret
  34+ A92A              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A92A              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A92A              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A92A              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A92A              ;;;	ret
  39+ A92A
  40+ A92A              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A92A 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A92B 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A92C 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A92E              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A92E 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A92F B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A930 C8             ret z
  48+ A931 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A934 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A936              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A936 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A938 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A939 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A93B C9             ret
  55+ A93C
  56+ A93C              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A93C              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A93C              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A93C              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A93C 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A93E AF                   xor a
  62+ A93F              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A93F 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A940 17                   rla
  65+ A941 B9                   cp c
  66+ A942 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A944 91                   sub c
  68+ A945 2C                   inc l
  69+ A946              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A946 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A948 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A949 32 66 94             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A94C C9                   ret
  74+ A94D
  75+ A94D
  76+ A94D
  77+ A94D              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A94D              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A94D              BFRDIV:
  80+ A94D F5           		push	af
  81+ A94E 3A 65 94     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A951 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A952 F1           		pop		af
  84+ A953 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A955 CA 6C A9     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A958              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A958 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A95A 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A95B              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A95B 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A95D AF           		xor a
  92+ A95E              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A95E 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A95F 17           		rla
  95+ A960 B9           		cp c
  96+ A961 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A963 2C           		inc l
  98+ A964 91           		sub c
  99+ A965              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A965 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A967 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A968 32 66 94     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A96B C9           		ret
 104+ A96C              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A96C 32 66 94     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A96F C9           		ret
 107+ A970              ;	push	af
 108+ A970              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A970              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A970              ;	pop		af
 111+ A970              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A970              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A970              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A970              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A970              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A970              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A970              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A970              ;	sla		a
 119+ A970              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A970              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A970              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A970              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A970              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A970              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A970              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A970              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A970              ;	scf
 128+ A970              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A970              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A970              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A970              ;LL2:
 132+ A970              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A970              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A970              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A970              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A970              ;	ret

 903  A970                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A970              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A970              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A970              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A970 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A971 3A 65 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A974 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A976 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A978 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A979 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A97B AF               xor a
  11+ A97C              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A97C CB 21            sla c
  13+ A97E 17               rla
  14+ A97F BA               cp d
  15+ A980 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A982 0C               inc c
  17+ A983 92               sub d
  18+ A984              LL64:
  19+ A984 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A986 32 64 94     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A989 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A98A 32 66 94     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A98D C9               ret
  24+ A98E              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A98E 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A990 32 66 94     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A993 32 64 94     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A996 C9           	ret
  29+ A997
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ A997              asm_mult12:
   2+ A997              RSequQmulA:
   3+ A997              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ A997 CD 3F A8     	call APequQmulA
   5+ A99A 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ A99B 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ A99C 32 67 94     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ A99F 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ A9A0 32 66 94     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ A9A3 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ A9A4 C9           	ret

   1++A9A5              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2++A9A5                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2++A9A5 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2++A9A8 32 75 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3++A9AB                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3++A9AB 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3++A9AE 32 76 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4++A9B1                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
   4++A9B1 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
   4++A9B4 32 77 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a
   5++A9B7 C9                   ret
   6++A9B8
   7++A9B8              CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15:
   8++A9B8                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1 ,XX15VecX
   8++A9B8 3A 1C C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
   8++A9BB 32 75 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   9++A9BE                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY
   9++A9BE 3A 1E C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
   9++A9C1 32 76 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10++A9C4                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  10++A9C4 3A 20 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
  10++A9C7 32 77 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  11++A9CA C9                   ret
  12++A9CB
  13++A9CB              CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15:
  14++A9CB                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX+1 ,XX15VecX
  14++A9CB 3A 16 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)
  14++A9CE 32 75 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
  15++A9D1                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevY+1, XX15VecY
  15++A9D1 3A 18 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)
  15++A9D4 32 76 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
  16++A9D7                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  16++A9D7 3A 1A C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)
  16++A9DA 32 77 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  17++A9DD C9                   ret

   1++A9DE              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
   2++A9DE                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
   2++A9DE 3A 75 C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   2++A9E1 32 22 C0    >               ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
   3++A9E4                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatNosevY+1

   9++A9F7 3A 76 C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecY)
