  32+ AA17
  33+ AA17              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ AA17              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ AA17              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ AA17 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ AA18 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ AA19 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ AA1C 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ AA1D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ AA1F CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ AA22              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ AA22              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ AA22              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ AA22 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ AA23 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ AA25 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ AA26 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ AA27 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ AA29 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ AA2B              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ AA2B CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ AA2D              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ AA2D FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ AA2F DA 3C AA    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ AA32 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ AA34 37           		scf
  56+ AA35 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ AA37 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ AA39              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ AA39 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ AA3A B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ AA3B C9           		ret
  62+ AA3C              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ AA3C B7           	or			a
  64+ AA3D CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ AA3F 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ AA41 C3 39 AA     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ AA44
  68+ AA44              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ AA44              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ AA44
  71+ AA44
  72+ AA44
  73+ AA44
  74+ AA44              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ AA44 CD 6F AB     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ AA47 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ AA4A C3 80 AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ AA4D
  79+ AA4D              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ AA4D AF           		xor		a
  81+ AA4E 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ AA4F 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ AA52 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ AA54 CA 44 AA     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ AA57 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ AA5A 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ AA5B 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ AA5E CD 35 AB     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ AA61 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ AA64 C3 80 AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ AA67              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ AA67              TIDY:
  93+ AA67 DD 01                break
  94+ AA69              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ AA69              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ AA69 CD A5 A9     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ AA6C CD 96 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ AA6F CD DE A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ AA72              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ AA72 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ AA75 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ AA77 CA 4D AA     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ AA7A              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ AA7A CD FB AA             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ AA7D 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ AA80              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ AA80 CD B8 A9     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ AA83 CD 96 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ AA86              ;calc sidev x
 110+ AA86 CD F1 A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ AA89 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ AA8C 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ AA8F 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ AA92 CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ AA95 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ AA98 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ AA99 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ AA9C CD 17 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ AA9F                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ AA9F A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ AAA0 CA A5 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ AAA3 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ AAA5              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ AAA5 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ AAA8              ;calc sidev y
 124+ AAA8 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ AAAB 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ AAAE 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ AAB1 CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ AAB4 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ AAB7 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ AAB8 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ AABB CD 17 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ AABE                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ AABE A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ AABF CA C4 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ AAC2 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ AAC4              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ AAC4 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ AAC7              ;calc sidev z
 137+ AAC7 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ AACA 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ AACD 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ AAD0 CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ AAD3 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ AAD6 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ AAD7 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ AADA CD 17 AA     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ AADD                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ AADD A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ AADE CA E3 AA    >				jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ AAE1 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ AAE3              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ AAE3 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ AAE6              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ AAE6 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ AAE9 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ AAEB AF                   xor     a
 153+ AAEC              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ AAEC 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ AAED 23           		inc		hl
 156+ AAEE 23           		inc		hl
 157+ AAEF 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ AAF1 CD CB A9     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ AAF4 CD 96 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ AAF7              ;calc sidev x
 161+ AAF7 CD 04 AA     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ AAFA
 163+ AAFA C9           		ret
 164+ AAFB
 165+ AAFB
 166+ AAFB
 167+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ AAFB              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ AAFB
 239+ AAFB
 240+ AAFB              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ AAFB              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 242+ AAFB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ AAFB 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ AAFE 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 243+ AB01 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ AB04 CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ AB07              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ AB07 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ AB0A 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 246+ AB0D 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ AB10 CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ AB13 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ AB14 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ AB16 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ AB18              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ AB18 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ AB1B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ AB1C E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ AB1E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ AB20 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ AB22 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ AB23 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ AB25 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ AB26 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 261+ AB27 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ AB28 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ AB2A CD 18 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ AB2D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ AB2F EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ AB31 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ AB33 B0           		or		b
 268+ AB34 C9           		ret
 269+ AB35
 270+ AB35
 271+ AB35              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ AB35              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 273+ AB35              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ AB35 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ AB38 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 274+ AB3B 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ AB3E CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ AB41              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ AB41 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ AB44 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 277+ AB47 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ AB4A CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ AB4D 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ AB4E E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ AB50 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ AB52 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ AB55 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ AB56 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ AB58 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ AB5A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ AB5C 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ AB5D E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ AB5F 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ AB60 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 291+ AB61 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ AB62 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ AB64 CD 18 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ AB67 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ AB69 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ AB6B E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ AB6D B0           		or		b
 298+ AB6E C9           		ret
 299+ AB6F
 300+ AB6F              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ AB6F              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 302+ AB6F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ AB6F 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ AB72 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 303+ AB75 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ AB78 CD 97 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ AB7B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ AB7B 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ AB7E 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 306+ AB81 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ AB84 CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ AB87 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ AB88 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ AB8A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ AB8C 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ AB8F 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ AB90 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ AB92 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ AB94 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ AB96 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ AB97 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ AB99 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ AB9A 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 320+ AB9B 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ AB9C 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ AB9E CD 18 A4     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ ABA1 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ ABA3 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ ABA5 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ ABA7 B0           		or		b
 327+ ABA8 C9           		ret
 328+ ABA9
 329+ ABA9
 330+ ABA9
 331+ ABA9              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ ABA9              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 335+ ABA9              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ ABA9              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 341+ ABA9              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ ABA9              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ ABA9              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ ABA9              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 348+ ABA9              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ ABA9              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 354+ ABA9              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ ABA9              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ ABA9              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 360+ ABA9              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ ABA9              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ ABA9              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ ABA9              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ ABA9              ;;		push	bc
 368+ ABA9              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ ABA9              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ ABA9              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ ABA9              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ ABA9              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ ABA9              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ ABA9              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ ABA9              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ ABA9
 377+ ABA9
 378+ ABA9
 379+ ABA9
 380+ ABA9
 381+ ABA9
 382+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ ABA9              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ ABA9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 908  ABA9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ ABA9
   2+ ABA9              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ ABA9 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ ABAA D2 C8 AB    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ ABAD 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ ABAF CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ ABB1 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ ABB3                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ ABB3 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ ABB4 DA B9 AB    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ ABB7 92                                   sub     d
   8+ ABB8                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ ABB8 B7          >                    or a
   9+ ABB9 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ ABBA CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ ABBC 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ ABBE 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ ABBF C9                                   ret
  14+ ABC0 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ ABC1 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ ABC2 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ ABC4 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ ABC6 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ ABC7 C9                                   ret
  20+ ABC8 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ ABCA C9                                   ret
  22+ ABCB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 909  ABCB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ ABCB              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ ABCB              TIS1:
   3+ ABCB 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ ABCC 3A F7 93     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ ABCF 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ ABD0 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ ABD1              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ ABD1 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ ABD2 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ ABD3 32 65 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ ABD6 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ ABD7 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ ABD9 CD DF A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ ABDC              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ ABDC              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ ABDC              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ ABDC 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ ABDD E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ ABDF 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ ABE0 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ ABE1 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ ABE3 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ ABE5 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ ABE6              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ ABE6 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ ABE8 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ ABEA 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ ABEC DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ ABEE              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ ABEE CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ ABF0 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ ABF2 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ ABF3 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ ABF4 C9           		ret
  35+ ABF5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

 918  ABF5                  INCLUDE "./Drive/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Drive/drive_access.asm
   1+ ABF5              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ ABF5              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ ABF5              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ ABF5              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ ABF5              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ ABF5              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ ABF5
   8+ ABF5              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ ABF5              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ ABF5              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ ABF5
  12+ ABF5 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ ABF9 DD E5
  13+ ABFB AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ ABFC CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ ABFD 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ ABFE 32 08 AC                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ AC01 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ AC05 C1 F1
  18+ AC07 C9                                   ret
  19+ AC08 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ AC09
  21+ AC09              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ AC09              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ AC09              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ AC09              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ AC09              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ AC09              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ AC09 E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ AC0C DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ AC0E 3A 08 AC                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ AC11 CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ AC12 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ AC13 DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ AC16 C9                                   ret
  34+ AC17
  35+ AC17              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ AC17              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ AC17              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ AC17              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ AC17              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ AC17              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ AC17 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ AC18 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ AC19 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ AC1C E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ AC1D CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ AC1E 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ AC1F E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ AC20 C9                                   ret
  49+ AC21
  50+ AC21              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ AC21              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ AC21              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ AC21              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ AC21              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ AC21              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ AC21 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ AC22 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ AC23 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ AC26 E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ AC27 CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ AC28 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ AC29 E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ AC2A C9                                   ret
  64+ AC2B
  65+ AC2B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ AC2B              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ AC2B              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ AC2B              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ AC2B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ AC2B B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ AC2C C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ AC2D CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ AC2E 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ AC2F C9                                   ret
  75+ AC30
  76+ AC30              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ AC30              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ AC30              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ AC30              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ AC30              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ AC30              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ AC30              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ AC30 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ AC33 CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ AC34 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ AC35 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ AC38 C9                                   ret
  88+ AC39
  89+ AC39              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ AC39              ; Init the file system
  91+ AC39              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ AC39 CD F5 AB     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ AC3C C9                                   ret
  94+ AC3D
  95+ AC3D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ AC3D              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ AC3D              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ AC3D              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ AC3D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ AC3D CD F5 AB     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ AC40 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ AC43                                      ; get file size
 103+ AC43 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ AC44 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ AC45 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ AC46 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ AC47 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ AC4A E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ AC4B DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ AC4D 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ AC4F CD 09 AC                             call    fOpen
 112+ AC52 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ AC54 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ AC56 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ AC58 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ AC5B F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ AC5C CD 17 AC                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ AC5F 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ AC61 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ AC62 CD 2B AC                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ AC65 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ AC67 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ AC6A C9                                   ret
 124+ AC6B              ;
 125+ AC6B              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ AC6B              ;
 127+ AC6B DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ AC6D C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ AC6E
 130+ AC6E              .error_closing:
 131+ AC6E C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ AC6F D1                                   pop	de
 133+ AC70 C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ AC71 C9                                   ret
 135+ AC72
 136+ AC72              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ AC72              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ AC72              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ AC72              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ AC72              ;		bc = size
 141+ AC72              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ AC72 CD F5 AB     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ AC75 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ AC77 E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ AC78 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ AC7A 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ AC7C CD 09 AC                             call    fOpen
 148+ AC7F 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ AC81 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ AC83 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ AC85 DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ AC87 C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ AC88 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ AC89 CD 21 AC                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ AC8C 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ AC8E F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ AC8F CD 2B AC                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ AC92 C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ AC93              ;
 160+ AC93              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ AC93              ;
 162+ AC93 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ AC95 C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ AC96 C9                                   ret
 165+ AC97
# file closed: ./Drive/drive_access.asm

  18+ AD44
  19+ AD44              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AD44              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AD44              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AD44 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AD45 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AD46 23           	inc			hl
  25+ AD47 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AD48 23           	inc			hl
  27+ AD49 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AD4A 23           	inc			hl
  29+ AD4B 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AD4C 23           	inc			hl
  31+ AD4D E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AD4E EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AD4F 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AD51                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ AD51 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ AD55 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ AD58 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ AD59 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ AD5A 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AD5C C9           	ret
  40+ AD5D
  41+ AD5D
  42+ AD5D              print_boiler_text:
  43+ AD5D              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ AD5D              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ AD5D C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ AD5E 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ AD5F 23           	inc			hl
  48+ AD60 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ AD61 23           	inc			hl
  50+ AD62 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ AD63 23           	inc			hl
  52+ AD64 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AD65 23           	inc			hl
  54+ AD66 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ AD67 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ AD68 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ AD6A C5           	push		bc
  58+ AD6B D1           	pop			de
  59+ AD6C CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ AD6F E1           	pop			hl
  61+ AD70 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ AD71 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AD73 C9           	ret

   2++AD74

   4++AD77 11 22 AD     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++AD7A 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++AD7C CD 86 AD     	call	.Num1
   7++AD7F 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++AD81 CD 86 AD     	call	.Num1
   9++AD84 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++AD86              .Num1:
  11++AD86 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++AD88              .Num2:
  13++AD88 04           	inc		b
  14++AD89 81           	add		a,c
  15++AD8A 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++AD8C 91           	sub 	c
  17++AD8D C5           	push	bc
  18++AD8E F5           	push	af
  19++AD8F 79           	ld		a,c
  20++AD90 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++AD92 CC 9B AD     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++AD95 78           	ld		a,b
  23++AD96 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++AD97 13           	inc		de
  25++AD98 F1           	pop		af
  26++AD99 C1           	pop		bc
  27++AD9A C9           	ret
  28++AD9B              .InsertDot:
  29++AD9B 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++AD9D 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++AD9E 13           	inc		de
  32++AD9F C9           	ret

  66+ ADA0
  67+ ADA0 2A 2A 98     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ ADA3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ ADA4 DD 2A 2C 98                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ ADA8 FD 21 33 AD                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ ADAC CD 28 A7                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ ADAF FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ ADB2 32 3F AD                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ ADB5 21 34 AD     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ ADB8 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ ADB9 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ ADBB C8                                   ret		z
  78+ ADBC FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ ADC0 C9                                   ret

  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a

  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg

 149+ C1CD 3A 37 95     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance

 162+ C1F3 CD E8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 77 95                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 28 A7                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 5C A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number

 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 5C A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 5C A5                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl

  24+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  25+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  26+ C0A9              GCM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:

  31+ C0B0              	MMUSelectSpriteBank
  31+ C0B0 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

  36+ C0BB 47           	ld		b,a

  38+ C0BF CB 3F        	srl		a
  39+ C0C1 CB 3F        	srl		a								; divide range of fuel by 4 for galactic chart

  54+ C0DC
  55+ C0DC
  56+ C0DC              plot_gc_stars:
  57+ C0DC AF           	xor		a
  58+ C0DD 32 6A 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
  59+ C0E0 DD 21 16 E0      ld      ix,galaxy_data
  60+ C0E4              .CounterLoop:
  61+ C0E4 3A 37 95         ld      a,(Galaxy)
  62+ C0E7                  MMUSelectGalaxyA
  62+ C0E7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  63+ C0EA DD E5            push    ix
  64+ C0EC E1               pop     hl
  65+ C0ED 11 51 94         ld      de,SystemSeed
  66+ C0F0 CD A3 98     	call    copy_seed
  67+ C0F3 3A 54 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed w1_h is Xcoord of star
  68+ C0F6 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = X Coord
  69+ C0F7 3A 52 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  70+ C0FA CB 3F        	srl		a								; Ycoord /2
  71+ C0FC C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset		; add offset to Y coord of star
  72+ C0FE 47           	ld		b,a								; b = row
  73+ C0FF C5           	push	bc
  74+ C100 3E D8        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour
  75+ C102                  MMUSelectLayer2
  75+ C102 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  76+ C106 CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  77+ C109 C1           	pop		bc
  78+ C10A 3A 55 94     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  79+ C10D F6 50        	or		$50								; minimum distance away
  80+ C10F FE 90        	cp		$90
  81+ C111 30 0A        	jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel
  82+ C113              .SecondPixel:
  83+ C113 0C           	inc		c
  84+ C114 3E 6C        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  85+ C116                  MMUSelectLayer2
  85+ C116 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  86+ C11A CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  87+ C11D              .NoSecondPixel:
  88+ C11D DD E5            push    ix
  89+ C11F E1               pop     hl
  90+ C120 ED 34 08 00      add     hl,8
  91+ C124 E5               push    hl
  92+ C125 DD E1            pop     ix
  93+ C127 3A 6A 94     	ld		a,(XSAV)
  94+ C12A 3D           	dec		a
  95+ C12B FE 00        	cp		0
  96+ C12D C8           	ret		z
  97+ C12E 32 6A 94     	ld		(XSAV),a
  98+ C131 18 B1        	jr		.CounterLoop

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 115+ C2C5              SDM_print_boiler_text:
 116+ C2C5                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C2C5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C2C6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C2C7 23           	inc			hl
   7++C2C8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C2C9 23           	inc			hl
   9++C2CA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C2CB 23           	inc			hl
  11++C2CC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C2CD 23           	inc			hl
  13++C2CE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C2CF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C2D0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C2D2 C5           	push		bc
  17++C2D3 D1           	pop			de
  18++C2D4                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C2D8 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C2DB E1           	pop			hl
  21++C2DC C1           	pop			bc
  22++C2DD 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C2DF C9           	ret
  24++C2E0
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  75+ C0F6 06 09                                ld b,9
  76+ C0F8 0E 00                                ld c,0

  78+ C0FC B7                                   or a
  79+ C0FD DD 5E 00     .MKTclcn322:            ld e,(ix+0)
  80+ C100 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
  81+ C103 2A 7F C1                             ld hl,(.MKTclcn32z)
  82+ C106 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  83+ C108 22 7F C1                             ld (.MKTclcn32z),hl
  84+ C10B DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)

  88+ C116 22 81 C1                             ld (.MKTclcn32zIX),hl

  91+ C11C 3C                                   inc a

  95+ C125 2A 7F C1                             ld hl,(.MKTclcn32z)
  96+ C128 19                                   add hl,de
  97+ C129 22 7F C1                             ld (.MKTclcn32z),hl

  99+ C12F DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)

 121+ C183              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
 122+ C183 01 F0 D8     MPM_DispHLtoDE:         ld	bc,-10000
 123+ C186 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 124+ C189 01 18 FC                             ld	bc,-1000
 125+ C18C CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 126+ C18F 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 127+ C192 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 128+ C195 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 129+ C197 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 130+ C19A 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 131+ C19C 3E 2F        MPM_Num1:	            ld	a,'0'-1
 132+ C19E 3C           .Num2:	                inc	a
 133+ C19F 09                                   add	hl,bc
 134+ C1A0 38 FC                                jr	c,.Num2
 135+ C1A2 ED 42                                sbc	hl,bc
 136+ C1A4 12                                   ld	(de),a
 137+ C1A5 13                                   inc	de
 138+ C1A6 C9                                   ret

 141+ C1A9 6F                                   ld l,a

 143+ C1AD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144+ C1AD 26 00        MPM_DispPriceAtoDE:     ld h,0
 145+ C1AF 6F                                   ld l,a
 146+ C1B0 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 147+ C1B3 CD C3 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 148+ C1B6 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 149+ C1B8 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 150+ C1BB 3E 2E                                ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
 151+ C1BD 12                                   ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
 152+ C1BE 13                                   inc		de						; with just an inc De
 153+ C1BF 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 154+ C1C1 18 D9                                jr		MPM_Num1
 155+ C1C3 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 156+ C1C5 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 157+ C1C6 09                                   add	hl,bc
 158+ C1C7 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 159+ C1C9 FE 30                                cp	'0'
 160+ C1CB 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 161+ C1CD 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 162+ C1CF ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 163+ C1D1 12                                   ld	(de),a
 164+ C1D2 13                                   inc	de
 165+ C1D3 C9                                   ret
 166+ C1D4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 167+ C1D4 FE 00        MPM_DispQtyAtoDE:       cp	0
 168+ C1D6 28 30                                jr	z,.NoStock
 169+ C1D8 26 00                                ld h,0
 170+ C1DA 6F                                   ld l,a
 171+ C1DB 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 172+ C1DE CD F7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 173+ C1E1 FE 20        .WasLead0:              cp      ' '
 174+ C1E3 20 09                                jr      nz,.NotHundredsZero
 175+ C1E5 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 176+ C1E7 CD F7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 177+ C1EA 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 178+ C1EC 18 AE                                jr		MPM_Num1
 179+ C1EE 0E F6        .NotHundredsZero:       ld	c,-10
 180+ C1F0 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 181+ C1F3 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 182+ C1F5 18 A5                                jr		MPM_Num1
 183+ C1F7 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 184+ C1F9 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 185+ C1FA 09                                   add	hl,bc
 186+ C1FB 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 187+ C1FD FE 30                                cp	'0'
 188+ C1FF 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 189+ C201 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 190+ C203 ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 191+ C205 12                                   ld	(de),a
 192+ C206 13                                   inc	de
 193+ C207 C9                                   ret
 194+ C208 3E 20        .NoStock:               ld	a,' '
 195+ C20A 12                                   ld	(de),a
 196+ C20B 13                                   inc	de
 197+ C20C 12                                   ld	(de),a
 198+ C20D 13                                   inc	de
 199+ C20E 3E 2D                                ld	a,'-'
 200+ C210 12                                   ld	(de),a
 201+ C211 13                                   inc de
 202+ C212 C9                                   ret
 203+ C213              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 204+ C213              MPM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C213
   2++C213              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C213              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C213 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C214 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C215 23           	inc			hl
   7++C216 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C217 23           	inc			hl
   9++C218 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C219 23           	inc			hl
  11++C21A 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C21B 23           	inc			hl
  13++C21C E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C21D EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C21E 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C220 C5           	push		bc
  17++C221 D1           	pop			de
  18++C222                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C222 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C226 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C229 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C22A C1           	pop			bc
  22++C22B 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C22D C9           	ret
  24++C22E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 354+ C3CD 3C                                   inc		a
 355+ C3CE FE 11                                cp		17
 356+ C3D0 20 F6                                jr		nz,MarketLoop
 357+ C3D2 AF           .InitialHighlight:      xor     a
 358+ C3D3 32 74 C0                             ld      (mkt_selected_row),a        ; assume on row zero
 359+ C3D6 CD B3 C0                             call    mkt_highlight_row
 360+ C3D9 21 64 C0     .DisCargo:              ld      hl,mkt_hold_level
 361+ C3DC 11 10 A8                             ld      de,$A810
 362+ C3DF                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 362+ C3DF ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 363+ C3E3 CD 80 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 364+ C3E6 CD 69 C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCargo
 365+ C3E9 21 6C C0     .DisCash:               ld      hl,mkt_cash
 366+ C3EC 11 10 B0                             ld      de,$B010
 367+ C3EF                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ C3EF ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 368+ C3F3 CD 80 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 369+ C3F6 CD 7A C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCash
 370+ C3F9 C9                                   ret
 371+ C3FA
 372+ C3FA
 373+ C3FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 374+ C3FA              ; Handles all the input whilst in the market menu
 375+ C3FA 3E 4A        loop_market_menu:       ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorUp
 376+ C3FC CD 53 92                             call    is_key_pressed
 377+ C3FF CC 1B C4                             call    z,mkt_UpPressed
 378+ C402 3E 4C                                ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorDown
 379+ C404 CD 53 92                             call    is_key_pressed
 380+ C407 CC 2C C4                             call    z,mkt_DownPressed
 381+ C40A 3E 08                                ld      a,c_Pressed_RollLeft
 382+ C40C CD 53 92                             call    is_key_pressed
 383+ C40F CC 3D C4                             call    z,mkt_LeftPressed
 384+ C412 3E 0A                                ld      a,c_Pressed_RollRight
 385+ C414 CD 53 92                             call    is_key_pressed
 386+ C417 CC 80 C4                             call    z,mkt_RightPressed
 387+ C41A C9                                   ret
 388+ C41B
 389+ C41B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 390+ C41B 3A 74 C0     mkt_UpPressed:          ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 391+ C41E FE 00                                cp      0
 392+ C420 C8                                   ret     z
 393+ C421 CD C3 C0                             call    mkt_lowlight_row
 394+ C424 21 74 C0                             ld      hl,mkt_selected_row
 395+ C427 35                                   dec     (hl)
 396+ C428 CD B3 C0                             call    mkt_highlight_row
 397+ C42B C9                                   ret
 398+ C42C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 399+ C42C 3A 74 C0     mkt_DownPressed:        ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 400+ C42F FE 10                                cp      16
 401+ C431 C8                                   ret     z
 402+ C432 CD C3 C0                             call    mkt_lowlight_row
 403+ C435 21 74 C0                             ld      hl,mkt_selected_row
 404+ C438 34                                   inc     (hl)
 405+ C439 CD B3 C0                             call    mkt_highlight_row
 406+ C43C C9                                   ret
 407+ C43D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ C43D 3A 74 C0     mkt_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 409+ C440 21 35 98                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 410+ C443 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 411+ C445 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 412+ C446 FE 00                                cp      0
 413+ C448 C8                                   ret     z
 414+ C449 35                                   dec     (hl)
 415+ C44A DD 21 00 E0                          ld      ix,StockFood
 416+ C44E 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 417+ C451 16 08                                ld      d,8
 418+ C453 5F                                   ld      e,a
 419+ C454 ED 30                                mul
 420+ C456 DD 19                                add     ix,de
 421+ C458                                      MMUSelectStockTable
 421+ C458 ED 91 57 37 >                     nextreg StockTableMMU,     BankStockTable
 422+ C45C DD 34 01                             inc     (ix+1)
 423+ C45F DD 7E 07                             ld      a,(ix+7)
 424+ C462 FE 30                                cp      48
 425+ C464 20 04                                jr      nz,.UnderATonne
 426+ C466 21 34 98                             ld      hl,CargoRunningLoad
 427+ C469 35                                   dec     (hl)            ; We need to cosider UoM
 428+ C46A DD 7E 02     .UnderATonne:           ld      a,(ix+2)
 429+ C46D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 430+ C46F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 431+ C470 CD 78 A1                             call    addDEtoCash
 432+ C473                                      ; DO ADD CASH
 433+ C473 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 434+ C476 CD 8B C2                             call    PrintMarketItem
 435+ C479 CD 69 C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCargo
 436+ C47C CD 7A C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCash
 437+ C47F C9                                   ret
 438+ C480              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 439+ C480              mkt_RightPressed:       MMUSelectStockTable
 439+ C480 ED 91 57 37 >                     nextreg StockTableMMU,     BankStockTable
 440+ C484 DD 21 00 E0                          ld      ix,StockFood
 441+ C488 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 442+ C48B 16 08                                ld      d,8
 443+ C48D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 444+ C48E ED 30                                mul
 445+ C490 DD 19                                add     ix,de
 446+ C492 4F                                   ld      c,a
 447+ C493 DD 7E 01                             ld      a,(ix+1)
 448+ C496 FE 00                                cp      0
 449+ C498 C8                                   ret     z
 450+ C499 DD 7E 07     .CheckUoM:              ld      a,(ix+7)
 451+ C49C FE 30                                cp      48
 452+ C49E 28 0F                                jr      z,.CheckCargo                       ; cargo is in tonnes
 453+ C4A0 3A 74 C0     .NotTonnage:            ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 454+ C4A3 21 35 98                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 455+ C4A6 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 456+ C4A8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 457+ C4A9 FE C8                                cp      200
 458+ C4AB C8                                   ret     z                                   ; else its a 200 UoM limit
 459+ C4AC C3 B5 C4                             jp      .CheckCash
 460+ C4AF 2A 33 98     .CheckCargo:            ld      hl,(CargoBaySize)                   ; = h = runningload l = cargo bay size
 461+ C4B2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 462+ C4B3 BD                                   cp      l
 463+ C4B4 C8                                   ret     z                                   ; return if we have already maxed out
 464+ C4B5 2A 2C 98     .CheckCash:             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
 465+ C4B8 7C                                   ld      a,h
 466+ C4B9 B5                                   or      l
 467+ C4BA 20 0F                                jr      nz,.MoreThanRequired
 468+ C4BC 2A 2A 98                             ld      hl,(Cash)
 469+ C4BF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 470+ C4C0 FE 00                                cp      0
 471+ C4C2 20 07                                jr      nz,.MoreThanRequired
 472+ C4C4 DD 7E 02                             ld      a,(ix+2)
 473+ C4C7 BD                                   cp      l
 474+ C4C8 30 01                                jr      nc,.MoreThanRequired
 475+ C4CA C9                                   ret                         ; Insufficient Funds
 476+ C4CB 19           .MoreThanRequired:      add     hl,de
 477+ C4CC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 478+ C4CD B3                                   or      e
 479+ C4CE                                      ; check cash can we buy, and cargo capacity
 480+ C4CE DD 35 01                             dec     (ix+1)
 481+ C4D1 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 482+ C4D4 21 35 98                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 483+ C4D7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 484+ C4D9 34                                   inc     (hl)
 485+ C4DA DD 7E 07                             ld      a,(ix+7)
 486+ C4DD 47                                   ld      b,a
 487+ C4DE FE 30                                cp      48
 488+ C4E0 20 05                                jr      nz,.UnderOneTonne
 489+ C4E2 78                                   ld      a,b
 490+ C4E3 21 34 98                             ld      hl,CargoRunningLoad
 491+ C4E6 34                                   inc     (hl)
 492+ C4E7 DD 7E 02     .UnderOneTonne:         ld      a,(ix+2)
 493+ C4EA 16 00                                ld      d,0
 494+ C4EC 5F                                   ld      e,a
 495+ C4ED CD 8B A1                             call    subDEfromCash
 496+ C4F0 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 497+ C4F3 CD 8B C2                             call    PrintMarketItem
 498+ C4F6 CD 69 C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCargo
 499+ C4F9 CD 7A C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCash
 500+ C4FC C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Menus/market_prices_menu.asm

 105+ C163 01 F0 D8     MPD_DispHLtoDE:         ld	bc,-10000
 106+ C166 CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1

 108+ C16C CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1

 112+ C177 CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1

 126+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 127+ C18D 26 00        MPD_DispPriceAtoDE:     ld h,0
 128+ C18F 6F                                   ld l,a
 129+ C190 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 130+ C193 CD A3 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 131+ C196 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 132+ C198 CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1
 133+ C19B 3E 2E                                ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
 134+ C19D 12                                   ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
 135+ C19E 13                                   inc		de						; with just an inc De
 136+ C19F 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 137+ C1A1 18 D9                                jr		MPD_Num1
 138+ C1A3 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 139+ C1A5 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 140+ C1A6 09                                   add	hl,bc
 141+ C1A7 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 142+ C1A9 FE 30                                cp	'0'
 143+ C1AB 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 144+ C1AD 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 145+ C1AF ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 146+ C1B1 12                                   ld	(de),a
 147+ C1B2 13                                   inc	de
 148+ C1B3 C9                                   ret
 149+ C1B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 150+ C1B4 FE 00        MPD_DispQtyAtoDE:       cp	0
 151+ C1B6 28 30                                jr	z,.NoStock
 152+ C1B8 26 00                                ld h,0
 153+ C1BA 6F                                   ld l,a
 154+ C1BB 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 155+ C1BE CD D7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 156+ C1C1 FE 20        .WasLead0:              cp      ' '
 157+ C1C3 20 09                                jr      nz,.NotHundredsZero
 158+ C1C5 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 159+ C1C7 CD D7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 160+ C1CA 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 161+ C1CC 18 AE                                jr		MPD_Num1
 162+ C1CE 0E F6        .NotHundredsZero:       ld	c,-10
 163+ C1D0 CD 7C C1                             call	MPD_Num1
 164+ C1D3 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 165+ C1D5 18 A5                                jr		MPD_Num1
 166+ C1D7 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 167+ C1D9 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 168+ C1DA 09                                   add	hl,bc
 169+ C1DB 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 170+ C1DD FE 30                                cp	'0'
 171+ C1DF 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 172+ C1E1 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 173+ C1E3 ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 174+ C1E5 12                                   ld	(de),a
 175+ C1E6 13                                   inc	de
 176+ C1E7 C9                                   ret
 177+ C1E8 3E 20        .NoStock:               ld	a,' '
 178+ C1EA 12                                   ld	(de),a

 183+ C1F0 12                                   ld	(de),a
 184+ C1F1 13                                   inc de

 186+ C1F3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ C1F3              MPD_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C1F3
   2++C1F3              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C1F3              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C1F3 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C1F4 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C1F5 23           	inc			hl
   7++C1F6 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C1F7 23           	inc			hl
   9++C1F8 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C1F9 23           	inc			hl
  11++C1FA 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C1FB 23           	inc			hl
  13++C1FC E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C1FD EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C1FE 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C200 C5           	push		bc
  17++C201 D1           	pop			de
  18++C202                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C202 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C206 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C209 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C20A C1           	pop			bc
  22++C20B 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C20D C9           	ret
  24++C20E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
