1317+ D848 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1318+ D84A              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1319+ D84A EB               ex          de,hl
1320+ D84B FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1321+ D84E FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1322+ D851              EyeProcessYPoint:
1323+ D851 ED 4B 79 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1324+ D855 79           	ld			a,c
1325+ D856 32 65 94     	ld			(varQ),a
1326+ D859 3A 77 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1327+ D85C CD A4 A3     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1328+ D85F 3A 78 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1329+ D862                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1329+ D862 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1329+ D864 C2 6F D8    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1330+ D867              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1331+ D867 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1332+ D869                  ClearCarryFlag
1332+ D869 B7          >                    or a
1333+ D86A ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1334+ D86C C3 74 D8         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1335+ D86F              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1336+ D86F 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1337+ D871 26 00            ld          h,0
1338+ D873 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1339+ D874              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1340+ D874 EB               ex          de,hl
1341+ D875 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1342+ D878 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1343+ D87B C9               ret
1344+ D87C
1345+ D87C
1346+ D87C
1347+ D87C              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1348+ D87C              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1349+ D87C              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1350+ D87C              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1351+ D87C              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1352+ D87C              ; which can be simplified as:
1353+ D87C              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1354+ D87C              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1355+ D87C              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1356+ D87C              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1357+ D87C              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1358+ D87C              ;      Roll calculations:
1359+ D87C              ;
1360+ D87C              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1361+ D87C              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1362+ D87C              ;      Pitch calculations:
1363+ D87C              ;
1364+ D87C              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1365+ D87C              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1366+ D87C
1367+ D87C
1368+ D87C              ApplyMyRollToVector:    MACRO angle, vectorX, vectorY
1369+ D87C ~                                    ldCopyByte angle,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1370+ D87C ~                                    ldCopy2Byte vectorY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1371+ D87C ~                                    ldCopyByte  vectorX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1372+ D87C ~                                    ld a,(vectorX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1373+ D87C ~                                    xor $80                             ;
1374+ D87C ~                                    call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1375+ D87C ~                                    ld  (vectorY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1376+ D87C ~                                    ldCopy2Byte vectorX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1377+ D87C ~                                    ld  a,(vectorY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1378+ D87C ~                                    call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1379+ D87C ~                                    ld  (vectorX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1380+ D87C                                      ENDM
1381+ D87C
1382+ D87C              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
1382+ D87C             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1382+ D87C 3A 23 94    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1382+ D87F 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1382+ D882             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1382+ D882 2A 23 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
1382+ D885 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1382+ D888             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1382+ D888 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
1382+ D88B 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1382+ D88E 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1382+ D891 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1382+ D893 CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1382+ D896 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1382+ D89A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1382+ D89A 2A 21 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
1382+ D89D 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1382+ D8A0 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1382+ D8A3 CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1382+ D8A6 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1383+ D8AA C9                                   ret
1384+ D8AB              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
1384+ D8AB             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1384+ D8AB 3A 23 94    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1384+ D8AE 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1384+ D8B1             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1384+ D8B1 2A 17 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
1384+ D8B4 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1384+ D8B7             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1384+ D8B7 3A 15 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
1384+ D8BA 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1384+ D8BD 3A 16 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1384+ D8C0 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1384+ D8C2 CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1384+ D8C5 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1384+ D8C9             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1384+ D8C9 2A 15 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
1384+ D8CC 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1384+ D8CF 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1384+ D8D2 CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1384+ D8D5 ED 53 15 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1385+ D8D9 C9                                   ret
1386+ D8DA              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
1386+ D8DA             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1386+ D8DA 3A 23 94    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1386+ D8DD 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1386+ D8E0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1386+ D8E0 2A 1D C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
1386+ D8E3 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1386+ D8E6             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1386+ D8E6 3A 1B C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
1386+ D8E9 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1386+ D8EC 3A 1C C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1386+ D8EF EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1386+ D8F1 CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1386+ D8F4 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1386+ D8F8             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1386+ D8F8 2A 1B C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
1386+ D8FB 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1386+ D8FE 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1386+ D901 CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1386+ D904 ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1387+ D908 C9                                   ret
1388+ D909
1389+ D909              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY
1389+ D909             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1389+ D909 3A 15 94    >               ld       a,(BETA)
1389+ D90C 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1389+ D90F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1389+ D90F 2A 23 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
1389+ D912 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1389+ D915             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1389+ D915 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
1389+ D918 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1389+ D91B 3A 26 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1389+ D91E EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1389+ D920 CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1389+ D923 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1389+ D927             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1389+ D927 2A 25 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
1389+ D92A 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1389+ D92D 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1389+ D930 CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1389+ D933 ED 53 25 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1390+ D937 C9                                   ret
1391+ D938              ApplyMyPitchToSidev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY
1391+ D938             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1391+ D938 3A 15 94    >               ld       a,(BETA)
1391+ D93B 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1391+ D93E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1391+ D93E 2A 17 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
1391+ D941 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1391+ D944             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1391+ D944 3A 19 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
1391+ D947 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1391+ D94A 3A 1A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1391+ D94D EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1391+ D94F CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1391+ D952 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1391+ D956             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1391+ D956 2A 19 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
1391+ D959 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1391+ D95C 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1391+ D95F CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1391+ D962 ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1392+ D966 C9                                   ret
1393+ D967              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
1393+ D967             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1393+ D967 3A 15 94    >               ld       a,(BETA)
1393+ D96A 32 65 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
1393+ D96D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1393+ D96D 2A 1D C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
1393+ D970 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1393+ D973             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1393+ D973 3A 1F C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
1393+ D976 32 0A 94    >               ld       (varP),a
1393+ D979 3A 20 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1393+ D97C EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1393+ D97E CD DF A1    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1393+ D981 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1393+ D985             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1393+ D985 2A 1F C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
1393+ D988 22 66 94    >               ld       (varR),hl
1393+ D98B 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1393+ D98E CD DF A1    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1393+ D991 ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1394+ D995 C9                                   ret
1395+ D996
1396+ D996
1397+ D996              ; 1> (-a)-(-b)=  if ABS(a)> ABS(B), 1A> (ABS(a)-abs(b))*-1 Else 1B> (ABS(b)-abs(a))
1398+ D996              ; 2> (+a)-(+b)=  if ABS(a) > ABS(B),2A>  ABS(a)- abs (B)   else 2B> (ABS(B) - abs(A) * -1
1399+ D996              ; 3> (-a)-(+b)=  3A> (ABS(a) + ABS(b)) * -1
1400+ D996              ; 4> (+a)-(-b)=  4A> ABS(a) + ABS(b)
1401+ D996 47           AHLequUbnkYminusAHL:    ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1402+ D997 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1403+ D998 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)        ; hl = unsigned Y position
1404+ D99B 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)        ; ahl = signed Y corrodinate
1405+ D99E 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1406+ D99F A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1407+ D9A0                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1407+ D9A0 FA C1 D9    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1408+ D9A3 CD 5C A5     .SignsTheSame:          call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1409+ D9A6 38 0B                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1410+ D9A8 B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1411+ D9AB 7C                                   ld      a,h
1412+ D9AC B5                                   or      l
1413+ D9AD 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1414+ D9AF 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1415+ D9B0 C9                                   ret
1416+ D9B1 AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1417+ D9B2 C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1418+ D9B3 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1419+ D9B4 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1420+ D9B7 7C                                   ld      a,h
1421+ D9B8 B5                                   or      l
1422+ D9B9 28 04                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1423+ D9BB 79                                   ld      a,c
1424+ D9BC EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1425+ D9BE C9                                   ret
1426+ D9BF AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1427+ D9C0 C9                                   ret
1428+ D9C1 19           .SignsDifferent:        add     hl,de               ; if they are oppos
1429+ D9C2 7C                                   ld      a,h
1430+ D9C3 B5                                   or      l
1431+ D9C4 28 F9                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1432+ D9C6 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; then we always use the sign of y even if hl > de or de < hl
1433+ D9C7 C9                                   ret
1434+ D9C8
1435+ D9C8              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1436+ D9C8 47           AHLequKminusAHL:        ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1437+ D9C9 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1438+ D9CA 2A 7D 94                             ld      hl,(varKp1)         ; Ahl = K
1439+ D9CD 3A 7F 94                             ld      a,(varKp3)          ;
1440+ D9D0 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1441+ D9D1 A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1442+ D9D2                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1442+ D9D2 FA F3 D9    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1443+ D9D5 CD 5C A5     .SignsTheSame:          call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1444+ D9D8 38 0B                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1445+ D9DA B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1446+ D9DD 7C                                   ld      a,h
1447+ D9DE B5                                   or      l
1448+ D9DF 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1449+ D9E1 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1450+ D9E2 C9                                   ret
1451+ D9E3 AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1452+ D9E4 C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1453+ D9E5 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1454+ D9E6 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1455+ D9E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
1456+ D9EA B5                                   or      l
1457+ D9EB 28 04                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1458+ D9ED 79                                   ld      a,c
1459+ D9EE EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1460+ D9F0 C9                                   ret
1461+ D9F1 AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1462+ D9F2 C9                                   ret
1463+ D9F3 19           .SignsDifferent:        add     hl,de               ; if they are oppos
1464+ D9F4 7C                                   ld      a,h
1465+ D9F5 B5                                   or      l
1466+ D9F6 28 F9                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1467+ D9F8 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; then we always use the sign of y even if hl > de or de < hl
1468+ D9F9 C9                                   ret
1469+ D9FA              ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1470+ D9FA
1471+ D9FA 47           AHLequUbnkZplusAHL:     ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1472+ D9FB EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1473+ D9FC 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)        ; hl = unsigned Y position
1474+ D9FF 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)        ; ahl = signed Y corrodinate
1475+ DA02 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1476+ DA03 A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1477+ DA04                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1477+ DA04 FA 12 DA    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1478+ DA07 19           .SignsTheSame:          add     hl,de
1479+ DA08 7C                                   ld      a,h
1480+ DA09 B5                                   or      l
1481+ DA0A 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1482+ DA0C 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1483+ DA0D C9                                   ret
1484+ DA0E AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1485+ DA0F C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1486+ DA10 AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1487+ DA11 C9                                   ret
1488+ DA12 CD 5C A5     .SignsDifferent:        call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1489+ DA15 38 09                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1490+ DA17 B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1491+ DA1A 7C                                   ld      a,h
1492+ DA1B B5                                   or      l
1493+ DA1C 28 F0                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1494+ DA1E 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1495+ DA1F C9                                   ret
1496+ DA20 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1497+ DA21 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1498+ DA24 7C                                   ld      a,h
1499+ DA25 B5                                   or      l
1500+ DA26 28 E8                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1501+ DA28 79                                   ld      a,c
1502+ DA29 EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1503+ DA2B C9                                   ret
1504+ DA2C
1505+ DA2C
1506+ DA2C
1507+ DA2C              ; Full version
1508+ DA2C              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1509+ DA2C              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
1510+ DA2C              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
1511+ DA2C              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
1512+ DA2C
1513+ DA2C
1514+ DA2C                                      MACRO   APPequPosPlusAPP Position, PositionSign
1515+ DA2C ~                                    push    bc
1516+ DA2C ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1517+ DA2C ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
1518+ DA2C ~                                    ld      b,a
1519+ DA2C ~                                    ld      a,c
1520+ DA2C ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1521+ DA2C ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1522+ DA2C ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1523+ DA2C ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1524+ DA2C ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
1525+ DA2C ~                                    add     hl,de
1526+ DA2C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1527+ DA2C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1528+ DA2C ~                                    pop     bc
1529+ DA2C ~                                    ret
1530+ DA2C ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1531+ DA2C ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1532+ DA2C ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
1533+ DA2C ~                                    or      a
1534+ DA2C ~                                    sbc     hl,de
1535+ DA2C ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1536+ DA2C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1537+ DA2C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1538+ DA2C ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1539+ DA2C ~                                    pop     bc
1540+ DA2C ~                                    ret
1541+ DA2C ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
1542+ DA2C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
1543+ DA2C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1544+ DA2C ~                                    pop     bc
1545+ DA2C ~                                    ret
1546+ DA2C                                      ENDM
1547+ DA2C
1548+ DA2C
1549+ DA2C              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
1549+ DA2C C5          >                        push    bc
1549+ DA2D 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1549+ DA2E 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
1549+ DA31 47          >                        ld      b,a
1549+ DA32 79          >                        ld      a,c
1549+ DA33 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1549+ DA34 FA 45 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1549+ DA37             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1549+ DA37 ED 5B 0B 94 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1549+ DA3B 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
1549+ DA3E 19          >                        add     hl,de
1549+ DA3F 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1549+ DA42 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1549+ DA43 C1          >                        pop     bc
1549+ DA44 C9          >                        ret
1549+ DA45             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1549+ DA45 ED 5B 0B 94 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1549+ DA49 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
1549+ DA4C B7          >                        or      a
1549+ DA4D ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1549+ DA4F 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1549+ DA51 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1549+ DA52 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1549+ DA55 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1549+ DA57 C1          >                        pop     bc
1549+ DA58 C9          >                        ret
1549+ DA59             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1549+ DA59 AF          >                    xor a
1549+ DA5A 95          >                    sub l
1549+ DA5B 6F          >                    ld l,a
1549+ DA5C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
1549+ DA5D 94          >                    sub h
1549+ DA5E 67          >                    ld h,a
1549+ DA5F 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1549+ DA62 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1549+ DA63 C1          >                        pop     bc
1549+ DA64 C9          >                        ret
1550+ DA65
1551+ DA65              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
1551+ DA65 C5          >                        push    bc
1551+ DA66 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1551+ DA67 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
1551+ DA6A 47          >                        ld      b,a
1551+ DA6B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1551+ DA6C A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1551+ DA6D FA 7E DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1551+ DA70             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1551+ DA70 ED 5B 0B 94 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1551+ DA74 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1551+ DA77 19          >                        add     hl,de
1551+ DA78 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1551+ DA7B 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1551+ DA7C C1          >                        pop     bc
1551+ DA7D C9          >                        ret
1551+ DA7E             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1551+ DA7E ED 5B 0B 94 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1551+ DA82 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1551+ DA85 B7          >                        or      a
1551+ DA86 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1551+ DA88 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1551+ DA8A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1551+ DA8B 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1551+ DA8E EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1551+ DA90 C1          >                        pop     bc
1551+ DA91 C9          >                        ret
1551+ DA92             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1551+ DA92 AF          >                    xor a
1551+ DA93 95          >                    sub l
1551+ DA94 6F          >                    ld l,a
1551+ DA95 9F          >                    sbc a,a
1551+ DA96 94          >                    sub h
1551+ DA97 67          >                    ld h,a
1551+ DA98 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1551+ DA9B 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1551+ DA9C C1          >                        pop     bc
1551+ DA9D C9          >                        ret
1552+ DA9E
1553+ DA9E              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
1553+ DA9E C5          >                        push    bc
1553+ DA9F 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1553+ DAA0 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
1553+ DAA3 47          >                        ld      b,a
1553+ DAA4 79          >                        ld      a,c
1553+ DAA5 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1553+ DAA6 FA B7 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1553+ DAA9             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1553+ DAA9 ED 5B 0B 94 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1553+ DAAD 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
1553+ DAB0 19          >                        add     hl,de
1553+ DAB1 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1553+ DAB4 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1553+ DAB5 C1          >                        pop     bc
1553+ DAB6 C9          >                        ret
1553+ DAB7             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1553+ DAB7 ED 5B 0B 94 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1553+ DABB 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
1553+ DABE B7          >                        or      a
1553+ DABF ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1553+ DAC1 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1553+ DAC3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1553+ DAC4 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1553+ DAC7 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1553+ DAC9 C1          >                        pop     bc
1553+ DACA C9          >                        ret
1553+ DACB             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1553+ DACB AF          >                    xor a
1553+ DACC 95          >                    sub l
1553+ DACD 6F          >                    ld l,a
1553+ DACE 9F          >                    sbc a,a
1553+ DACF 94          >                    sub h
1553+ DAD0 67          >                    ld h,a
1553+ DAD1 22 0B 94    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1553+ DAD4 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1553+ DAD5 C1          >                        pop     bc
1553+ DAD6 C9          >                        ret
1554+ DAD7
1555+ DAD7              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
1556+ DAD7 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
1557+ DADA              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
1558+ DADA              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
1559+ DADA              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
1560+ DADA
1561+ DADA
1562+ DADA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1563+ DADA              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
1564+ DADA 3A 24 94     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
1565+ DADD 21 17 94                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
1566+ DAE0 B6                                   or      (hl)
1567+ DAE1 CA 9B DB                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
1568+ DAE4                                      ;break
1569+ DAE4              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
1570+ DAE4 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
1571+ DAE5 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
1572+ DAE8 CD 3B A2                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
1573+ DAEB 32 0C 94                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
1574+ DAEE 22 0A 94                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
1575+ DAF1              ; A = Flip sign
1576+ DAF1 3A 26 94                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
1577+ DAF4 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
1578+ DAF7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
1579+ DAF8              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
1580+ DAF8 CD 65 DA                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
1581+ DAFB              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
1582+ DAFB 32 D9 DA                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
1583+ DAFE 22 D7 DA                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
1584+ DB01              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
1585+ DB01 3A 17 94                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
1586+ DB04 5F                                   ld      e,a
1587+ DB05 CD 3B A2                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
1588+ DB08 32 0C 94                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
1589+ DB0B 22 0A 94                             ld      (varP),hl
1590+ DB0E              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
1591+ DB0E 3A D9 DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
1592+ DB11 5F                                   ld      e,a
1593+ DB12 3A 18 94                             ld      a,(BET2)
1594+ DB15 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
1595+ DB16              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
1596+ DB16 CD 9E DA                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
1597+ DB19 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
1598+ DB1C 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
1599+ DB1F              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
1600+ DB1F 3A 17 94                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
1601+ DB22 5F                                   ld      e,a
1602+ DB23 CD 3B A2                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
1603+ DB26 32 0C 94                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
1604+ DB29 22 0A 94                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
1605+ DB2C              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
1606+ DB2C 3A D9 DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
1607+ DB2F 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
1608+ DB32 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
1609+ DB33 3A 18 94                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
1610+ DB36 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
1611+ DB37 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
1612+ DB38 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
1613+ DB3B AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
1614+ DB3C F2 4B DB                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
1615+ DB3F 2A 0B 94                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
1616+ DB42 ED 5B D7 DA                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
1617+ DB46 B7                                   or      a
1618+ DB47 19                                   add     hl,de
1619+ DB48 C3 65 DB                             jp      .MV44
1620+ DB4B 2A D7 DA     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
1621+ DB4E ED 5B 0B 94                          ld      de,(varPp1)
1622+ DB52 B7                                   or      a
1623+ DB53 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
1624+ DB55 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
1625+ DB57                                      NegHL
1625+ DB57 AF          >                    xor a
1625+ DB58 95          >                    sub l
1625+ DB59 6F          >                    ld l,a
1625+ DB5A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
1625+ DB5B 94          >                    sub h
1625+ DB5C 67          >                    ld h,a
1626+ DB5D 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit
1627+ DB60 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
1628+ DB62 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
1629+ DB65              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
1630+ DB65 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
1631+ DB68 3A 24 94                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
1632+ DB6B 5F                                   ld      e,a
1633+ DB6C 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1634+ DB6F CD 3B A2                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
1635+ DB72 32 0C 94                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
1636+ DB75 22 0A 94                             ld      (varP),hl
1637+ DB78 3A 25 94                             ld      a,(ALP2)
1638+ DB7B 5F                                   ld      e,a
1639+ DB7C 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
1640+ DB7F AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
1641+ DB80 CD 2C DA                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
1642+ DB83 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
1643+ DB86 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
1644+ DB89                                      ;break
1645+ DB89                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
1646+ DB89
1647+ DB89 CD 7C D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
1648+ DB8C CD AB D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
1649+ DB8F CD DA D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
1650+ DB92 CD 09 D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
1651+ DB95 CD 38 D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
1652+ DB98 CD 67 D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
1653+ DB9B 3A 61 94     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
1654+ DB9E 16 00                                ld      d,0
1655+ DBA0 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
1656+ DBA1 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
1657+ DBA4 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
1658+ DBA7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
1659+ DBA8 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
1660+ DBAA CD 6A CB                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
1661+ DBAD 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
1662+ DBB0 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
1663+ DBB3 C9                                   ret
1664+ DBB4              ; .....................................................
1665+ DBB4              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1666+ DBB4              ; for each node:
1667+ DBB4              ;     see if node >
1668+ DBB4 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1669+ DBB5 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1670+ DBB7 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1671+ DBB9 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1672+ DBBA              ProcessNodes:
1673+ DBBA AF               xor     a
1674+ DBBB 32 F1 C2         ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1675+ DBBE CD BE CF         call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1676+ DBC1 CD 23 87         call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1677+ DBC4 CD A0 D1         call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1678+ DBC7 CD 6D D0         call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1679+ DBCA 21 17 C3         ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1680+ DBCD 3A 07 C3         ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#8 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1681+ DBD0              GetActualVertexCount:
1682+ DBD0 4F               ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1683+ DBD1 4F               ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1684+ DBD2 16 06            ld      d,6
1685+ DBD4 CD D4 A3         call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1686+ DBD7 41               ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1687+ DBD8 FD 21 BF C0      ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1688+ DBDC              LL48:
1689+ DBDC              PointLoop:
1690+ DBDC C5           	push	bc                                  ; save counters
1691+ DBDD E5           	push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1692+ DBDE FD E5        	push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1693+ DBE0 78               ld      a,b
1694+ DBE1                  ;break
1695+ DBE1 CD A2 D7         call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1696+ DBE4 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1697+ DBE7 CD C8 89     	call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1698+ DBEA CD 2A 8A     	call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1699+ DBED CD A3 87     	call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1700+ DBF0 FD E1        	pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1701+ DBF2 CD 25 D8     	call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1702+ DBF5                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1703+ DBF5                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1704+ DBF5              ReadyForNextPoint:
1705+ DBF5 FD E5        	push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1706+ DBF7 E1           	pop		hl
1707+ DBF8 3E 04        	ld		a,4
1708+ DBFA ED 31        	add		hl,a
1709+ DBFC E5           	push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1710+ DBFD FD E1        	pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1711+ DBFF E1           	pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1712+ DC00 3E 06        	ld		a,6
1713+ DC02 ED 31        	add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1714+ DC04 C1           	pop		bc                                  ; get counter back
1715+ DC05 10 D5        	djnz	PointLoop
1716+ DC07              ; ......................................................
1717+ DC07 C9               ret
1718+ DC08              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1719+ DC08              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1720+ DC08              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1721+ DC08              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1722+ DC08              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1723+ DC08              ;
1724+ DC08              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1725+ DC08              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1726+ DC08              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1727+ DC08              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1728+ DC08              AddLaserBeamLine:
1729+ DC08              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1730+ DC08              GetGunVertexNode:
1731+ DC08 3A 05 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1732+ DC0B 21 BF C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1733+ DC0E ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1734+ DC10 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1735+ DC13              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1736+ DC13 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1737+ DC14 23                   inc         hl
1738+ DC15 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1739+ DC16 23                   inc         hl
1740+ DC17 ED 43 75 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1741+ DC1B 0C                   inc         c
1742+ DC1C C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1743+ DC1D 04                   inc         b
1744+ DC1E C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1745+ DC1F              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1746+ DC1F 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1747+ DC20 23                   inc         hl
1748+ DC21 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1749+ DC22 23                   inc         hl
1750+ DC23 ED 43 77 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1751+ DC27              SetX2PointToXX15:
1752+ DC27 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1753+ DC2A ED 43 79 C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1754+ DC2E 3A 12 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1755+ DC31 4F                   ld          c,a
1756+ DC32              SetY2PointToXX15:
1757+ DC32 ED 43 7B C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1758+ DC36 3A 0E C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1759+ DC39                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1759+ DC39 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1759+ DC3B CA 43 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1760+ DC3E              LL74DecX2:
1761+ DC3E 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1762+ DC40 32 79 C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1763+ DC43              LL74SkipDec:
1764+ DC43 CD 68 CD             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1765+ DC46 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1766+ DC48              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1767+ DC48 2A 68 94             ld          hl,(varU16)
1768+ DC4B 3A 75 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1769+ DC4E 77                   ld          (hl),a
1770+ DC4F 23                   inc         hl
1771+ DC50 3A 77 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1772+ DC53 77                   ld          (hl),a
1773+ DC54 23                   inc         hl
1774+ DC55 3A 79 C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1775+ DC58 77                   ld          (hl),a
1776+ DC59 23                   inc         hl
1777+ DC5A 3A 7B C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1778+ DC5D 77                   ld          (hl),a
1779+ DC5E FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1780+ DC60 23                   inc         hl
1781+ DC61 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1782+ DC63 22 68 94             ld          (varU16),hl
1783+ DC66 C9                   ret
1784+ DC67
1785+ DC67                  INCLUDE "PrepLines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/PrepLines.asm
   1++DC67              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC67                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DC67              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC67              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC67 21 BF C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC6A ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC6C 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC6D 11 75 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DC70 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DC72 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DC74 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DC76 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DC78 C9                                   ret
  12++DC79
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   3++DC79                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DC79              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC79              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC79 21 BF C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC7C ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC7E 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC7F 11 79 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DC82 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DC84 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DC86 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DC88 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DC8A C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   4++DC8B                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DC8B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC8B              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DC8B ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DC8B ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DC8B ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DC8B                                  ENDM
   7++DC8B
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DC8B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DC8B              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DC8B               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DC8B 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DC8C
  10++DC8C              PrepLines:
  11++DC8C              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DC8C
  13++DC8C              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DC8C              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DC8C              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DC8C              ;        or          8
  17++DC8C              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DC8C              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DC8C              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DC8C              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DC8C              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DC8C              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DC8C              ;
  24++DC8C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DC8C              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DC8C                      ;break
  27++DC8C                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DC8C AF          >               xor      a
  27++DC8D 32 F1 C2    >               ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DC90                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DC90 AF          >               xor      a
  28++DC91 32 F2 C2    >               ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DC94                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DC94 AF          >               xor      a
  29++DC95 32 8B DC    >               ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DC98 3A 08 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DC9B DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DC9D FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DCA0 21 FF C1             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DCA3 22 68 94             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DCA6                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DCA6 3A 08 C3    >               ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DCA9 32 6C 94    >               ld       (XX17),a
  36++DCAC 3A 2B C0             ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DCAF                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DCAF CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DCB1 CA B9 DC    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DCB4 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DCB6 32 2B C0             ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DCB9              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DCB9              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DCB9              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DCB9              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DCB9              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DCB9 21 43 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DCBC                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DCBC 22 0F 94             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DCBF 3A 04 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DCC2 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DCC3              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DCC3              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DCC3 2A 0F 94             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DCC6 E5                   push        hl
  54++DCC7 FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DCC9                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DCC9 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DCC9                      ENDIF
  58++DCC9 3A FF 93             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DCCC 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DCCD              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DCCD FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DCD0                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DCD0 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DCD1 DA 24 DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DCD4              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DCD4              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DCD4              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DCD4 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DCD7 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DCD8 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DCDA                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DCDA 21 A1 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DCDD ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DCDF 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DCE0              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DCE0                      IfANotZeroGoto VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DCE0 FE 00       >				cp	0
  71++DCE2 C2 F6 DC    >				jp	nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DCE5              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DCE5 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DCE6 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DCE8 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DCEA E5                   push        hl
  77++DCEB                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DCEB 21 A1 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DCEE ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DCF0 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DCF1 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DCF2                      IfAIsZeroGoto LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DCF2 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DCF3 CA 24 DD    >				jp	z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DCF6              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DCF6              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DCF6              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DCF6 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DCF9 CD 67 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DCFC FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DCFF CD 79 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DD02 CD 68 CD             call        ClipLine
  88++DD05 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DD07              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DD07 ED 5B 68 94          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DD0B 21 75 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DD0E                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DD0E ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DD10 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DD12 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DD14 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DD16 ED 53 68 94          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DD1A 21 F1 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DD1D 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DD1E 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DD1F                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DD1F FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DD21 D2 3A DD    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DD24              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DD24              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DD24              LL78:
 101++DD24 2A 0F 94             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DD27 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DD29 ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DD2B 22 0F 94             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DD2E 21 8B DC             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DD31 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DD32 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DD33                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DD33 21 6C 94    >                  ld    hl,XX17
 108++DD36 BE          >                  cp    (hl)
 108++DD37 C2 C3 DC    >                  jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DD3A              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DD3A              LL81:
 111++DD3A              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DD3A 3A F1 C2             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DD3D CB 27                sla         a
 114++DD3F CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DD41 32 F2 C2             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DD44              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DD44 C9                   ret
 118++DD45
# file closed: ./Universe/PrepLines.asm
1786+ DD45
1787+ DD45              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1788+ DD45
# file closed: ./Universe/univ_ship_data.asm
